viduram mantra kāryeṣu digjayeṣu dhanaṃjayam

dhaumyam brāhmaṇa cintāsu sahadevam ca saṃnidhau
uciteṣu ca kāryeṣu vṛddha amātyān akalpayat

original: na jagāda yadā kiṃcittadā rājāvadatpunaḥ // Bhmj_13.213 //

haraye namaḥ

tṛptāya siṃha   daitya saṃhāra kāriṇe

atha pāṇḍu sutaiḥ sārdham rathaiḥ gambhīra nādibhiḥ

āyāt kṛṣṇaḥ kurukṣetram tān paśyan bhārgava hradān

ruddham siṃham iva sphāra śara kāñcana pañjare

original: durbalaṃ ghnanti balinaḥ sevante ca parastriyaḥ /

original: māṃsaṃ mithaśca khādante rāṣṭre rājavivarjite // Bhmj_13.299 //

original: na ca dharmāḥ pravartante na ca varṣati vāsavaḥ // Bhmj_13.302 //
analyzed: na ca dharmāḥ pravartante na ca varṣati vāsavaḥ

original: yāvatkośe ca mitre ca śanakairupacīyase // Bhmj_13.392 //

protsāhānām akāryeṣu kurvīthāḥ
tatas tam saṃśaya āpannam druta kośam pramādinam
taiḥ taiḥ upāyaiḥ dravyaiḥ vā kurvīthāḥ kṣaṇa sādhanam
iti ukte muninā rājā kutsita ācāra kūṇitaḥ
mānī na etat karomi iti jagāda abhijana ujjvalaḥ

original: dūto bhūtvā svayaṃ saṃdhau tasya śatrumayo 'jayat // Bhmj_13.396 //

analyzed: samyak vṛttena satyena vartante hi gaṇāḥ sadā

original: praśāmyati bahiḥ kopo rājñāṃ sāmādibhiḥ kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: praśāmyati bahis kopaḥ rājñām sāma ādibhiḥ kṣaṇāt

original: na satyaṃ kevalaṃ satyamanṛtaṃ na tathānṛtam /
analyzed: na satyam kevalam satyam anṛtam na tathā anṛtam
hitam yat sarva lokasya tat satyam śeṣam anyathā
anṛtena anṛta ācāraḥ cikitsyaḥ kila bhūbhujā

satyānṛtakam
yājinaḥ śuddha saṃkalpāḥ tyāginaḥ pātra varṣiṇaḥ
trātāraḥ sarva dharmāṇam kartāraḥ puṇya karmaṇām

original: taranti ghoradurgāṇi paratreha ca bhūmipāḥ // Bhmj_13.405 //
analyzed: taranti ghora durgāṇi paratra iha ca bhūmipāḥ
sat ācārāḥ tapaḥ yuktāḥ praśāntāḥ satya vādinaḥ
saṃtaranti ca durgāṇi nārāyaṇa parāyaṇāḥ
durga ati taraṇam
asaumyāḥ saumya caritāḥ mṛdavaḥ krūra kāriṇaḥ

original: bhavanti puruṣā loke tāṃśca budhyeta bhūmipaḥ // Bhmj_13.407 //
analyzed: bhavanti puruṣāḥ loke tān ca budhyeta bhūmipaḥ
purā babhūva bhūpālaḥ prerakaḥ pūrikā patiḥ

original: kālena pañcatāṃ yātaḥ sa ca prāptaḥ śṛgālatām /
analyzed: kālena pañcatām yātaḥ sa ca prāptaḥ śṛgāla tām
janma antara kṛtaiḥ puṇyaiḥ jātam sasmāra duḥkhitaḥ

śmaśāna nilayam kopāt tam vilokya śuci vratam

tvayā mūḍha vratena idam svādu māṃsa rasāyanam

asmin pitṛ vane ghore śṛgālaḥ yat a māṃsa bhuj
bhuṅkṣva iti taiḥ abhihitaḥ saḥ vadat vimala āśayaḥ

original: iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ sarve vijñāya dṛḍhaniścayam /

na ūcuḥ kiṃcid amarśena kiṃtu atapyanta kevalam

original: uvāca mama sācivyaṃ śuddhātmā bhajatāṃ bhavān // Bhmj_13.417 //
analyzed: uvāca mama sācivyam śuddha ātmā bhajatām bhavān

analyzed: svācchandyam amṛtam tyaktvā kaḥ sevām vikaṭām śrayet

analyzed: mayā eva ekena bhṛtyena bhavitavyam sadā tvayā

original: śuddhāya tasmai bhṛtyāya vimohātputra mā krudhaḥ // Bhmj_13.426 //

original: svarūpaṃ vikṛto dveṣṭi śūraṃ bhūrurbudhaṃ jaḍaḥ /

analyzed: kulīnam hīna janmā ca duḥśīlā ca pativratām

uktvā iti śakram yāte smin aparaḥ niragāt tatas
saḥ pi pṛṣṭaḥ vadat daityam dharmaḥ ham śīla mārga gaḥ
viniḥsṛtaḥ tṛtīyaḥ satyam aramī iti uvāca tām
avadat vittam asmi iti caturthaḥ pi atha nirgataḥ

original: ahaṃ balamiti kṣipraṃ niryātaḥ pañcamo 'vadat // Bhmj_13.481 //
analyzed: aham balam iti kṣipram niryātaḥ pañcamaḥ vadat
tatas kamala paryaṅka sthitā kamala locanā
prahlāda vakrāt nirgatya jagāda kamalā svayam
vrajāmi aham yaḥ te śiṣyaḥ bhavat dvijaḥ

original: tasmai tvayā vitīrṇaṃ hi śīlaṃ śīlavibhūṣaṇa // Bhmj_13.483 //
analyzed: tasmai tvayā vitīrṇam hi śīlam śīla vibhūṣaṇa
śīlāt anugataḥ dharmaḥ satyam tad anuyāyi ca

original: yātaṃ vittaṃ ca tanmūlaṃ balaṃ caitannibandhanam // Bhmj_13.484 //
analyzed: yātam vittam ca tad mūlam balam ca etad nibandhanam
eteṣu surarājasya praviṣṭeṣu kramāt vapuḥ

original: śīlāśrayāṃ śriyaṃ viddhi māmapi prasthitāṃ vibho // Bhmj_13.485 //
analyzed: śīla āśrayām śriyam viddhi mām api prasthitām vibho
iti uktvā śakra sadanam yayau lakṣmīḥ vihāya tam
evam śīla udbhavāḥ sarvāḥ duryodhana vibhūtayaḥ
iti uktaḥ pi āmbikeyena na śaśāma suyodhanaḥ

original: pūjyeṣu vimukhā mohātsarvathā hi mumūrṣavaḥ // Bhmj_13.487 //
analyzed: pūjyeṣu vimukhāḥ mohāt sarvathā hi mumūrṣavaḥ
etat pitāmahena uktam śrutvā sarvam nṛpa ucitam
smṛtvā duryodhana kathām niḥśvasya uvāca dharmajaḥ
āśā mama abhūt vipulā satatam dhṛtarāṣṭra je

original: yathā vananivṛtteṣu sā māsmāsu vidhāsyati // Bhmj_13.489 //
analyzed: yathā vana nivṛtteṣu sā mā asmāsu vidhāsyati
sarvathā yuddha rucinā pratyākhyāte janārdane

original: āśā viphalatāṃ nītā sā tena mama saṃvṛtā // Bhmj_13.490 //
analyzed: āśā viphala tām nītā sā tena mama saṃvṛtā
tasmāt vaipulyam āyātāḥ tad bhaṅge duḥsahāḥ śucaḥ

original: nivartante kathaṃ nāma kathyatāṃ me pitāmaha // Bhmj_13.491 //
analyzed: nivartante katham nāma kathyatām me pitāmaha
pṛṣṭaḥ yudhiṣṭhireṇa iti punar śāntanavaḥ bravīt

original: āśā sumahatī pārtha daśā jīvitahāriṇī // Bhmj_13.492 //
analyzed: āśā su mahatī pārtha daśā jīvita hāriṇī
haihayaḥ rāja putraḥ prāk sumitraḥ nāma kānane
javāt anusasāra ekam kuraṅgam vegavattaram
sameṣu taru kuñjeṣu śvabhreṣu viṣameṣu ca
mṛga anusārī su cirāt sa dhanvī klamam āyayau
tatas tapaḥ vanam prāpya dṛṣṭa naṣṭe mṛge punar
āśā vināśa saṃtaptaḥ munīnām aviśat sabhām
sa tān praṇamya papraccha kaṣṭām āśām mahattamām
muniḥ tam vṛṣabhaḥ nāma babhāṣe sa smita ānanaḥ
rāja putra kṛśām āśām jahi duḥkha anubandhinīm
bhūridyumnaḥ purā rājā vīradyumna abhidham sutām
vicinvan hṛtam aśvena badaryāśramam āyayau
tatas tapaḥ vanam prāpya dṛṣṭa naṣṭe mṛge punar
āśā vināśa saṃtaptaḥ munīnām aviśat sabhām
sa tān praṇamya papraccha kaṣṭām āśām mahattamām

original: munistaṃ vṛṣabho nāma babhāṣe sa smitānanaḥ // Bhmj_13.499 //
analyzed: muniḥ tam vṛṣabhaḥ nāma babhāṣe sa smita ānanaḥ
rāja putra kṛśām āśām jahi duḥkha anubandhinīm

original: bhūridyumnaḥ purā rājā vīradyumnābhidhaṃ sutam // Bhmj_13.500 //
analyzed: bhūridyumnaḥ purā rājā vīradyumna abhidham sutam
tanuḥ nāma muniḥ tatra prāṃśuḥ kṛśatara ākṛtiḥ
duḥkhāntena avadat pṛṣṭaḥ mā rājan viklavaḥ bhava

original: na vidyate janaḥ kaścidāśayā yo na hīyate /
analyzed: na vidyate janaḥ kaścid āśayā yaḥ na hīyate

original: na ca paśyāmi taṃ loke yācakaṃ yo 'bhimanyate // Bhmj_13.502 //
analyzed: na ca paśyāmi tam loke yācakam yaḥ abhimanyate
kṛtaghneṣu nṛśaṃseṣu kuṭileṣu alaseṣu ca
āśā daurvalyam āyānti śaradi iva alpa nimnagāḥ
dhik tām kṛśatarām āśām kāya śoṣa vidhāyinīm
pratiśrutam a saṃprāpya hṛdayāt parivartate

original: putre mṛte vā naṣṭe vā piturekātmajasya vā /
analyzed: putre mṛte vā naṣṭe vā pituḥ eka ātmajasya vā

original: āśā dahati gātrāṇi sā kṛśāpi mahīyasī // Bhmj_13.505 //
analyzed: āśā dahati gātrāṇi sā kṛśā api mahīyasī
vṛddhānām putra lābheṣu nityam āśāḥ bhavanti yāḥ

original: sthāvire jīrṇakāyānāṃ tāḥ kṛśā api duḥsahāḥ // Bhmj_13.506 //
analyzed: sthāvire jīrṇa kāyānām tāḥ kṛśāḥ api duḥsahāḥ
bhrāmayati āpta mātrā eva śoṣayati āyatī kṛśā

original: hanti magnā jaṭilyeva dhigāśāṃ mṛtyudāyinīm // Bhmj_13.507 //
analyzed: hanti magnā dhik āśām mṛtyu dāyinīm
iti uktvā tanayam rājñe sa muniḥ divya locanaḥ
adarśayat svayam ca abhūt prakaṭam dharma vigrahaḥ
āśā pāśān parityajya yogī iva vijita indriyaḥ
pātuḥ mahasi kaunteya pṛthvīm pṛthuḥ iva aparaḥ

original: kośamūlaṃ balaṃ rājñāṃ tasminkṣīṇe yathā tathā /
analyzed: kośa mūlam balam rājñām tasmin kṣīṇe yathā tathā
a brāhmaṇa dhanaiḥ kāryāt tad vṛddhiḥ dharma saṃpade
rāja dharmāḥ
vaktāram sarva dharmāṇām siddhasindhu sutam nṛpaḥ
kṣīṇa kośa sahāyānām vṛttim papraccha bhūbhujām
balibhiḥ vijitaḥ rājā bhinna mantraḥ nirāśrayaḥ

original: nirutsāhatayā bhraṣṭaḥ kiṃ śreyaḥ saṃśrayediti // Bhmj_13.512 //
analyzed: nirutsāha tayā bhraṣṭaḥ kim śreyaḥ saṃśrayet iti
bhīṣmaḥ vadan narapatiḥ kṣīṇaḥ saṃdhāya vairibhiḥ
śanais kośa bala ādīnām yatnāt kuryāt vivardhanam

original: tūrṇaṃ varteta sāmnā vā tyaktātmā vāraṇaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: tūrṇam varteta sāmnā vā tyakta ātmā vāraṇam vrajet
ubhayoḥ antare tiṣṭhan dīrghasūtraḥ vinaśyati
vipadānām mūla ghātī yaḥ yam kośa a parikṣayaḥ

original: utthānopahatāstena prabhavanti na tāḥ kila // Bhmj_13.515 //
analyzed: utthāna upahatāḥ tena prabhavanti na tāḥ kila
gṛdhrāḥ prayānti eva śavam dagdham aṅgāra kāṣṭhakam

original: na tu dāridryasaṃspaṣṭaṃ kaścitspṛśati pūruṣam // Bhmj_13.516 //
analyzed: na tu dāridrya saṃspaṣṭam kaścid spṛśati pūruṣam
api klinna sirā jālam pūtiḥ yuṣitam śavam

original: na tathā varjayantyārāddhanahīnaṃ yathā janam // Bhmj_13.517 //
analyzed: na tathā varjayanti ārāt dhana hīnam yathā janam
vilupta vibhava udbhrānta cetasām viṣame pade
anaśvaram an ākramyam maryādā māninām dhanam
api an utsṛṣṭa maryādaḥ dasyuḥ syāt na viśṛṅkhalaḥ

original: maryādā saṃpadāṃ dhāma mūḍhatā vipadāmiva // Bhmj_13.519 //
analyzed: maryādā saṃpadām dhāma mūḍha tā vipadām iva
purā dasyu patiḥ vīraḥ kopavyaḥ guru pūjakaḥ
a parityakta maryādaḥ prāpa siddhim anuttamām
rakṣitā nyasta śastrāṇām dvijānām yoṣitām tathā

original: niḥśeṣadānavasakhaḥ sa lebhe vipulaṃ yaśaḥ // Bhmj_13.521 //
analyzed: niḥśeṣa dānava sakhaḥ sa lebhe vipulam yaśaḥ
kopa vyacaritam
na tat jagati nāma asti yat an ākramyam āpadām

original: śarīrarakṣā prathamaṃ tāsāṃ buddhiśca bheṣajam // Bhmj_13.522 //
analyzed: śarīra rakṣā prathamam tāsām buddhiḥ ca bheṣajam
prāpta jñaḥ dīrghadarśī ca dīrghasūkṣatraḥ ca sa anugāḥ
bahu putrāḥ purā matsyāḥ nyavasan salilāśaye
srāvyamāṇaḥ jale tatra dhīḥ varaiḥ tad jighṛkṣayā
dīrghadarśī parān ūce gacchāmaḥ mānasa antaram

original: ityarthitau tena yadā tau vimohānna jagmatuḥ /
analyzed: iti arthitau tena yadā tau vimohāt na jagmatuḥ

original: dīrghadarśī tadā pūrvaṃ svayaṃ prāyātsaraḥ param // Bhmj_13.525 //
analyzed: dīrghadarśī tadā pūrvam svayam prāyāt saraḥ param
tatas sruta jale dāśaiḥ kṛṣṭe matsya kadambake

original: lalambe kṛtakaṃ dhāmni prāptajño mṛtavatsvayam // Bhmj_13.526 //
analyzed: lalambe kṛtakam dhāmni prāpta jñaḥ mṛta vat svayam
saḥ phālān akhilān matsyān hatvā protān atha aparān
jala antare vikṣipuḥ jāla jīvinaḥ
nyasteṣu teṣu niḥśaṅkhaiḥ nadīṣu ambhasi dhīvaraiḥ

original: alakṣito yayau tūrṇaṃ prāptajño dhīmatāṃ varaḥ // Bhmj_13.528 //
analyzed: alakṣitaḥ yayau tūrṇam prāpta jñaḥ dhīmatām varaḥ
ardha jīvaḥ tu vicalan dīrghasūtraḥ mahā ākṛtiḥ
vyapādyata niṣādena laguḍaiḥ jarjarīkṛtaḥ
dīrghadarśīyam

original: bahunāṃ gocaraṃ yāto vairiṇāṃ viṣame sthitaḥ /
analyzed: bahunām gocaram yātaḥ vairiṇām viṣame sthitaḥ
kuryāt bala adhikam tebhyaḥ mitram kiṃtu atiśaṅkitaḥ

original: lomaśaṃ nāma mārjāraṃ jālabaddhaṃ vyalokayat // Bhmj_13.531 //
analyzed: lomaśam nāma mārjāram jāla baddham vyalokayat
baddhe tasmin gata āśaṅkaḥ sa jighran capala ānanaḥ
bhakṣyam niśi cacāra ākhuḥ vilikhan nakharaiḥ mahīm
haritam nāma saḥ paśyan nakulam lohita ānanam
candraka ākhyam ulūkam ca kūjantam ghora locanam

original: tau dṛṣṭvā balinau bhītaḥ saṃprāpte prāṇasaṃśaye /
analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā balinau bhītaḥ saṃprāpte prāṇa saṃśaye
mūṣikaḥ kalayan sarvāḥ diśaḥ kṣaṇam acintayat
nakula ulūka bhītaḥ ham mārjāram balinām varam

original: saṃśaye viṣamasthānāṃ saṃdhistrāṇaṃ hi śatruṇā // Bhmj_13.535 //
analyzed: saṃśaye viṣama sthānām saṃdhiḥ trāṇam hi śatruṇā
sa niścitya iti tad pāśa chedāya udyata mānasaḥ
mārjāram avadat nīla kāca kācara locanam
amitraḥ mittra tām yāti mittram āyāti amitra tām

original: kālena tasmācchetsyāmi pāśaṃ te mittratāṃ gataḥ // Bhmj_13.537 //
analyzed: kālena tasmāt chetsyāmi pāśam te mittra tām gataḥ
śrutvā etat madhuram hṛṣṭaḥ mārjāraḥ suhṛdam vyadhāt

original: gāḍhamaṅke pariṣvajya mūṣikaṃ vipadi sthitaḥ // Bhmj_13.538 //
analyzed: gāḍham aṅke pariṣvajya mūṣikam vipadi sthitaḥ
tat dṛṣṭvā nakula ulūkau nirāśau ā aśva bhakṣaṇe
babhūvatuḥ bhugna mukhau balavat prīti śaṅkitau
śanais śanais ciccheda snāyu bandhanam
tam tūrṇam tūrṇam iti ūce mārjāraḥ cirakāriṇam
sva artham uddiśya lambante ye kṣaṇam prīti tantubhiḥ
dhūrtān tān kārya śeṣeṇa yāpayet kārya yācakān
etat dhyātvā dhiyā eva ākhuḥ lubdhaka āgamanau anadhi
eka pāśa aṃśa śeṣam tam cakāra naya kovidaḥ
prātar ghoratare prāpte caṇḍāle parigha abhidhe
jāla nikṣipta nayane sa śastre pāśa jīvini
pāśa śeṣam cakarta ākhuḥ chitvā ca bilam āviśat

original: yāto vyādho nirāśaśca mārjāre vidrute drutam // Bhmj_13.544 //
analyzed: yātaḥ vyādhaḥ nirāśaḥ ca mārjāre vidrute drutam
tasmāt mhā bhayāt muktaḥ kālena abhyetya mūṣikam
antar sthitam bila dvārāt mārjāraḥ praṇataḥ vadat
aham sa te param mittram upakāra vaśīkṛtaḥ
bhṛśam utkaṇṭhi tām prāptaḥ sakhe nirgamyatām itas
iti bruvāṇam mārjāram dṛṣṭvā bhakṣaṇa dīkṣitam
śukla tīkṣṇa adra daśanam śmaśru sūcī cita ānanam
jighra antam muṣika āmodam ardha unmīlita locanam
ucca eka pāda nibhṛtam tam abhāṣata mūṣikaḥ
sauhārdena upayuktaḥ prāk tava ca aham bhāvan ca me

original: gamyatāṃ sa gataḥ kālo na bhūmirvañcaneṣvaham // Bhmj_13.549 //
analyzed: gamyatām sa gataḥ kālaḥ na bhūmiḥ vañcaneṣu aham
yat bhavān madhuram vakti tat mahyam na adya rocate
yācakaḥ saḥ adhunā na asti saṃgatam
nija prayojana apekṣā peśala priya bhāṣaṇaṇ
durbalaḥ krūra manasam dhīraḥ dūrāt eva ārya cetasam

original: na śreyo 'sti viruddho hi bhojyabhoktṛsamāgamaḥ // Bhmj_13.551 //
analyzed: na śreyaḥ sti viruddhaḥ hi bhojya bhoktṛ samāgamaḥ
kṛtajña bhavase mittram dūrāt eva ārya cetasam

original: na śreyo 'sti viruddho hi bhojyabhoktṛsamāgamaḥ // Bhmj_13.552 //
analyzed: na śreyaḥ sti viruddhaḥ hi bhojya bhoktṛ samāgamaḥ
nirasya bahubhiḥ vākyaiḥ mārjāram iti mūṣikaḥ

original: bilaṃ tatyājā kālena dṛṣṭaṃ dhūrtena śatruṇā // Bhmj_13.553 //
analyzed: bilam tatyāja ā kālena dṛṣṭam dhūrtena śatruṇā
mārjāra mūṣika saṃvādaḥ
evam eṣa nayaḥ prājñaiḥ jñātavyaḥ śatru saṃdhiṣu
na viśvaset priya girām viśeṣeṇa kṛta āgasām
kāmpilye nagare pūrvam brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ

original: uvāsa pūtanā nāma vihagī jīvajīvikā // Bhmj_13.555 //
analyzed: uvāsa pūtanā nāma vihagī jīva jīvikā
sā rāja bhavane jāta visrambhā ajījanat sutam
tad putra tulya janmā ca putraḥ bhūt tasya bhūbhujaḥ
vitīrya sāgara dvīpa saṃjātam sā phala dvayam

original: svaputraṃ rājupatraṃ ca bālye 'pi balinau vyadhāt // Bhmj_13.557 //
analyzed: sva putram rāju patram ca bālye balinau vyadhāt
tatas kadācid vihagam śiśum rāja sutaḥ balī
ādāya keli saṃsaktam cakāra gata jīvitam
vilokya nihatam putram samabhyetya atha pūtanā
tuṇḍena rāja putrasya kruddhā netre vyadārayat
pratikṛtya nikāreṇa duḥkhitā gantum udyayau
vrajantīm brahmadattaḥ tām harmyāt ālokya saṃbhramāt

original: vidāritākṣaṃ putraṃ ca jagādācchādya vikriyām // Bhmj_13.560 //
analyzed: vidārita akṣam putram ca jagāda ācchādya vikriyām
apakāre pratikṛte vairam vaireṇa pātitam

original: kopaḥ sāmyādapakrānto mā gamaḥ putri pūtane // Bhmj_13.561 //
analyzed: kopaḥ sāmyāt apakrāntaḥ mā gamaḥ putri pūtane
tat śrutvā uvāca vihagī na idānīm asti saṃgatam
kṛta pratikṛtam vairam abhyāsāt dviguṇam bhavet
śrutvā ca guru vṛddhebhyaḥ purāṇam api vismṛtam

original: sahasā navatāṃ yāti vairaṃ koṭaravahnivat // Bhmj_13.563 //
analyzed: sahasā nava tām yāti vairam koṭara vahni vat
kṛta apakāre viśvāsam mohāt yaḥ yāti bāliśaḥ

original: sa vismṛtātmā sahasā yāti kālavidheyatām // Bhmj_13.564 //
analyzed: sa vismṛta ātmā sahasā yāti kāla vidheya tām
gītena iva kuraṅgāṇam āmiṣeṇa iva pakṣiṇām
baḍiśena iva matsyānām viśvāsana vyathā nṛṇām
priya vādyaiḥ vibhinnānām saṃśleṣaḥ kila durlabhaḥ
muktāphalānām bhagnānām jatu leśaiḥ na saṃdhayaḥ

original: dhiktaṃ kudeśaḥ yatrātmā na śete 'śāṅkitaḥ sukham /
analyzed: dhik tam ku deśaḥ yatra ātmā na śete śāṅkitaḥ sukham

original: pravādaḥ kila satyo 'yaṃ yadātmārthe mahīṃ tyajet // Bhmj_13.567 //
analyzed: pravādaḥ kila satyaḥ yam yad ātma arthe mahīm tyajet

original: iti bruvāṇā sā rājñā prārthitāpi punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇā sā rājñā prārthitā api punar punar
aviśvāsa bhayāt prāyāt tyaktvā praṇaya gauravam
brahmadatta pūtanā saṃvādaḥ
āpad kāle ghṛṇām tyaktvā kṛta sneheṣu gauravaiḥ
pratikūleṣu varteta pratikūlataram dhiyā

original: rājñā śatruntapākhyena vṛttiṃ nītiṃ ca bhūbhujām /
analyzed: rājñā śatruntapa ākhyena vṛttim nītim ca bhūbhujām
kaṇiṅka nāmā nīti jñaḥ purā pṛṣṭaḥ bravīt muniḥ
mūla chedam ripoḥ kuryāt athavā na prakopayet
anyathā asau vināśāya pāda spṛṣṭaḥ iva uragaḥ
janam viśvasayet vācā śaucam dambhena darśayet

original: pragāṇaiḥ śapathaiḥ śāstraiḥ śatruṃ seveta śambaraiḥ // Bhmj_13.572 //
analyzed: pragāṇaiḥ śapathaiḥ śāstraiḥ śatrum seveta śambaraiḥ
atīta śāntaye snehaiḥ samam jaḍam anāgataiḥ
pratyakṣaiḥ upa patraiḥ ca piṇḍitaiḥ phala varjitaiḥ
tūla vat sahasā kṣipram jvalet avasare kvacid
manda pratāpaḥ dhūma aṅkaḥ na bhavet druma vahni vat
prayojana arthinaḥ kuryāt āśā bandhān sadā madā

original: na hi kaścitkṛte kārye kartāramanumanyate // Bhmj_13.575 //
analyzed: na hi kaścid kṛte kārye kartāram anumanyate
loka apavādāt udvegaḥ mārdavam cira kāritam
asaṃvṛttiḥ sva mantre vā
prasuptaḥ badhiraḥ ndhaḥ vā kāle syāt sva artha siddhaye
prapāta madhu vat tiṣṭet durlabhaḥ sarva dehinām
dāruṇaḥ syāt mukhe svāduḥ guḍa liptaḥ iva upalaḥ

original: viśedantaśca śatrūṇāṃ madhudigdha iva kṣuraḥ // Bhmj_13.578 //
analyzed: viśet antar ca śatrūṇām madhu digdhaḥ iva kṣuraḥ

prāṃśuḥ nīlotpala śyāmaḥ bhuvanāni vilokayan
sa babhūva trinetrasya brahma vākyāt kara agra gaḥ

original: tena niṣkaṇṭakaṃ kṛtvā rudro raudreṇa katejasā /
analyzed: tena niṣkaṇṭakam kṛtvā rudraḥ raudreṇa ka tejasā
jagat śiva ākṛtiḥ paścāt babhūva śaśibhūṣaṇaḥ

original: taṃ khaḍgaṃ lebhire bhūpā manuprabhṛtayaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: tam khaḍgam lebhire bhūpāḥ manu prabhṛtayaḥ kramāt

original: yasya dhārānipātena punarjanma na dehinām // Bhmj_13.677 //
analyzed: yasya dhārā nipātena punarjanma na dehinām

original: śrutveti mandiraṃ pārtho gatvā bhīṣmagiraḥ smaran /
analyzed: śrutvā iti mandiram pārthaḥ gatvā bhīṣma giraḥ smaran
vidureṇa kathāḥ cakre dharma sarvasva vādinā
teṣām vidura ṣaṣṭhānām babhūvuḥ vividhāḥ kathāḥ
śuddha pravṛtta dharmāṇām dharma kāma artha saṃśrayāḥ
samabhyetya atha papraccha punar bhīṣmam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: sauhārdaṃ kena na calediti pṛṣṭo 'bravīcca saḥ // Bhmj_13.680 //
analyzed: sauhārdam kena na calet iti pṛṣṭaḥ bravīt ca saḥ
kṛtajñaiḥ sādhubhiḥ sabhyaiḥ kulīnaiḥ anapāyibhiḥ
satām na naśyati prītiḥ guṇa ādāna eka tad paraiḥ
mitra druhaḥ kṛtaghnān ca varjayet kuṭila āśayān

original: kṛtaghnatāsamaṃ rājanna hi paśyāmi pātakam // Bhmj_13.682 //
analyzed: kṛtaghna tā samam rājan na hi paśyāmi pātakam
darpavān malina ācāraḥ veda adhyāpana varjitaḥ
sita tanuḥ śīla ācāra parāṅmukhaḥ
gautamaḥ nāma kaluṣaḥ brahmabandhuḥ abhūt purā
sa vasan śabarī saktaḥ paryanteṣu dhana arthi tām
bibhrat bhrāntvā vasumatīm sārtha bhraṣṭaḥ viśat vanam
tasmin snigdha taru chāye prasanna hari kuñjare
nyagrodha pādapasya agre chāyā arthī samupāviśat
nāḍījaṅgha abhidhaḥ tūrṇam bakaḥ sugata sat vrataḥ

original: vilokya taṃ kṛpāviṣṭo durgataṃ vinato 'bravīt // Bhmj_13.686 //
analyzed: vilokya tam kṛpā āviṣṭaḥ durgatam vinataḥ bravīt
brahman dāridryam unnidram tava etat pradahāmi aham

original: suhṛdaṃ me virūpākṣaṃ rākṣasendramito vraja // Bhmj_13.687 //
analyzed: suhṛdam me virūpākṣam rākṣasa indram itas vraja

original: kārtikyāṃ sa hi dātṝṇāṃ dhuryo dāsyati te dhanam /
analyzed: kārtikyām sa hi dātṝṇām dhuryaḥ dāsyati te dhanam

original: madīyamiti tacchrutvā sa gatvā karuṇākulāt // Bhmj_13.688 //
analyzed: madīyam iti tat śrutvā sa gatvā karuṇā kulāt
tasmāt kanakam āsādya bahulam tūrṇam āgataḥ

original: bakaṃ vilokya tatraiva dhanatuṣṭo vyacintayat // Bhmj_13.689 //
analyzed: bakam vilokya tatra eva dhana tuṣṭaḥ vyacintayat
na hi etat bhakṣyate hema vane vigata vikriye
sāṃpratam bakam evā adya pātayāmi su pīvaram
iti saṃcintya su ciram pātheya arthī dvija adhamaḥ
hema bhāra nataḥ suptam jaghāna sarala āśayam
adarśanena tasya atha khinnaḥ rākṣasa bhūpatiḥ

original: śaṅkākulaścāracakraṃ visṛjya prāpa taṃ dvijam // Bhmj_13.692 //
analyzed: śaṅkā ākulaḥ cāra cakram visṛjya prāpa tam dvijam

original: hataṃ tena bakaṃ jñātvā nijagrāha tamutkaṭam /
analyzed: hatam tena bakam jñātvā nijagrāha tam utkaṭam
ākāśa dhuni phenaiḥ ca jīvitam prāpa khecaraḥ
aparādha hatam dṛṣṭvā nāḍījaṅghaḥ gautamam
ajīvayat durācāram na manyuḥ adhame satām
evam kṛghna caritaḥ gautamaḥ sugata vratam

original: jaghāna pāpe pāpānāṃ niḥśaṅkaṃ ramate manaḥ // Bhmj_13.695 //
analyzed: jaghāna pāpe pāpānām niḥśaṅkam ramate manaḥ
nyāsa apahāriṇaḥ dhenu strī guru brāhmaṇa antakāḥ

original: dharmiṣṭhā iva yasyāgre sa kṛtaghno vicāryatām // Bhmj_13.696 //
analyzed: dharmiṣṭhāḥ iva yasya agre sa kṛtaghnaḥ vicāryatām
atha paprāccha dharma jñam dharmarājaḥ pitāmaham
katham samāśrayet dharmam vinaṣṭa dhana bāndhavaḥ

original: sa tena pṛṣṭaḥ provāca śṛṇu senajitaṃ nṛpam /
analyzed: sa tena pṛṣṭaḥ provāca śṛṇu senajitam nṛpam
putra śoka ākulam kaścid jñātvā abhyetya avadat dvijaḥ
abhāvāya eva jāyante bhave smin sarva jantavaḥ

original: śocyastvamapi kālena kathaṃ śocasi pārthiva // Bhmj_13.699 //
analyzed: śocyaḥ tvam api kālena katham śocasi pārthiva
yadṛcchayā saṃgataḥ ced pratiyātaḥ yadṛcchayā
saṃsāra adhvani tat kaḥ yam viyoge moha vibhramaḥ
jāyate kṣaṇa dṛṣṭeṣu snehaḥ duḥkhāya dehinām

original: mamāyamiti mugdhānāṃ na sa teṣāṃ na tasya te // Bhmj_13.701 //
analyzed: mama ayam iti mugdhānām na sa teṣām na tasya te
śocanti alubdham vāñchantaḥ prāptam śocanti durbhagam

original: naṣṭaṃ śocanti duḥkhārtā jantavaḥ sukhinaḥ kadā // Bhmj_13.702 //
analyzed: naṣṭam śocanti duḥkha ārtāḥ jantavaḥ sukhinaḥ kadā
dhana putra kalatreṣu na snihyanti vipaścitaḥ

original: avaśyaṃ viprayogo hi taiḥ paraiśca nṛṇāṃ sadā // Bhmj_13.703 //
analyzed: avaśyam viprayogaḥ hi taiḥ paraiḥ ca nṛṇām sadā
kaḥ nāma priya saṃyogāt na manyeta amṛta upamān

original: marmacchido viyogeṣu yadi na syurviṣotkaṭāḥ // Bhmj_13.704 //
analyzed: marma chidaḥ viyogeṣu yadi na syuḥ viṣa utkaṭāḥ
piṅgalā datta saṃketam kāntam vārāṅganā purā
anāgatam ciram dhyātvā svayam ekā bravīt niśi
āgatena api kim tena viyoge duḥkha dāyinā
bhaje kāntam iha antasthām anaśvaram a śocakam
iti saṃtoṣa pīyūṣa śāntā śāpa apavedanā

original: pratibuddhvaiva suṣvāpa parame dhāmni piṅgalā // Bhmj_13.707 //
analyzed: pratibuddhvā eva suṣvāpa parame dhāmni piṅgalā
senajidgītāḥ
asmin pravāha vat yāti nṛṇām āyuṣi kim sukham
pṛṣṭaḥ yudhiṣṭhireṇa iti punar ūce pitāmahaḥ
medhāvinā purā pṛṣṭaḥ putreṇa etat dvijaḥ pitā

original: uvācādhyayanaṃ kṛtvā brahmacārī tato gṛhī // Bhmj_13.709 //
analyzed: uvāca adhyayanam kṛtvā brahmacārī tatas gṛhī
putraiḥ pitṝṇām anuṇaḥ bhūtvā pītvā anilān vane
muniḥ tulya suhṛd dveṣyaḥ prayāti paramam padam
tat śrutvā uvāca tanayaḥ sarvam etat aninditam

original: ślāghyāya śreyase karma yadi kālaḥ pratīkṣate // Bhmj_13.711 //
analyzed: ślāghyāya śreyase karma yadi kālaḥ pratīkṣate
asamāpta sva kāryāṇām āyuḥ su alpam a mudritam
ahar rātra gaṇaiḥ eva sravayā itat alakṣitam
muhūrtam api jantūnām kālaḥ yam kalita akhilaḥ
sārthaḥ su dūra gāmī iva na arthitaḥ vilambate
kṣaṇa ardham api kāryeṣu na vilambeta paṇḍitaḥ

original: na jānīmaḥ kadā kasminkṛtānto nipatiṣyati // Bhmj_13.714 //
analyzed: na jānīmaḥ kadā kasmin kṛtāntaḥ nipatiṣyati
na vātsalyāt na kāruṇyāt na upayogāt na gauravāt

original: pratīkṣāṃ kṣamate kālaḥ kāryaśeṣeṣu dehinām // Bhmj_13.715 //
analyzed: pratīkṣām kṣamate kālaḥ kārya śeṣeṣu dehinām

original: mṛtyunā yasya sauhārdaṃ yo na vettyāyuṣo 'vadhim /
analyzed: mṛtyunā yasya sauhārdam yaḥ na vetti āyuṣaḥ vadhim

original: śvaḥ kartāsmīdamityeṣā vāṇī tasyaiva śobhate // Bhmj_13.716 //
analyzed: śvas kartāsmi idam iti eṣā vāṇī tasya eva śobhate
aho nu moha mugdhasya lokasya iyam pramādi tā
yat bālam mṛtam ālokya vṛddhaḥ tiṣṭhati nirbhayaḥ

original: nave vayasi bhogārhe naveṣu vibhaveṣu ca /
analyzed: nave vayasi bhoga arhe naveṣu vibhaveṣu ca

original: navoḍheṣu ca dāreṣu hriyate mṛtyunā janaḥ // Bhmj_13.718 //
analyzed: na voḍheṣu ca dāreṣu hriyate mṛtyunā janaḥ
tasmāt kuśalam eva ādau kāryam saṃsāra śāntaye
tarat taraṅga lolaḥ hi dehi deha samāgamaḥ
pitāputra saṃvādaḥ
dhaninām nirdhanānām ca vibhāgam sukha duḥkhayoḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ tha dharmarājena punar śāntanavaḥ bravīt
śampākaḥ nāmavān vipraḥ purā dhīmān abhāṣata
vitṛṣṇayā atipīḍyante saṃtoṣaḥ mṛta nirjharaḥ
bhaya anabhijñaḥ niścintaḥ nidrāvān roga varjitaḥ
nirdhanaḥ sukhitaḥ nityam yathā avāpta kṛta kriyaḥ

original: sukhamāste sukhaṃ śete sukhaṃ ca pratibudhyate /
analyzed: sukham āste sukham śete sukham ca pratibudhyate
saṃtoṣavān nirāyāsaḥ nirapāyaḥ nirāmayaḥ
dhaninaḥ darpa pūrṇasya bhrū bhaṅgāt vakra darśinaḥ
kumbhī nyasta dhana trāṇa cintā pāṇḍu kṛśa tviṣaḥ
cauraḥ bhūpāla bhītasya vṛddhyā artham pāpa kāriṇaḥ
ajīrṇa roga grastasya ṣṭhīvinaḥ bhojya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
lobha śuṣka kalatrasya duḥkha eka phala bhāginaḥ
spardhā kathā eva kā nityam ākiṃcanya amṛta āśibhiḥ
manyate tāvat ātmānam śakra vaiśravaṇa upamam
gṛhyate dhanavān yāvat na dasyu nṛpa manyubhiḥ
dhanam gamayatām bhūri gṛhān ca su paricchadān
nirdhanāt dhaninām eva kṛcchrāt duḥkha viṣūcikā
śampākagītāḥ
yāte vaiphalyam ārambhe kim kuryāt draviṇa utsukaḥ
etat pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitibhujā dhyātvā śāntanavaḥ vadat
śrūyatām yat vinaṣṭa artha samaye duḥkha bheṣajam
maṅkiḥ nāma dvijaḥ pūrvam īhamānaḥ sakṛt dhanam
prayatnaiḥ api na prāpa vidhi vaimukhya helāya
kṣīṇa arthaḥ saḥ ṛtha śeṣeṇa krītvā ca atha vṛṣa dvayam
svayam utkarṣaṇam cakre kṣetre vipula vāhakaḥ
atrā antare pṛthugrīvaḥ nidrā bhaṅgāt samutthitaḥ
jahāra uṣṭraḥ mahā kāyaḥ tau vṛṣau skandha lambinau
yuga utkṣepāt lambyamānau tau tena bala śālinā

original: vṛṣau vilokya śokārto vilalāpa dvijātmajaḥ // Bhmj_13.733 //
analyzed: vṛṣau vilokya śoka ārtaḥ vilalāpa dvija ātmajaḥ

original: aho nu citravarṇāṅkau mama vatsatarau priyau /
analyzed: aho nu citra varṇa aṅkau mama vatsatarau priyau
karṣan vibhāti karabhaḥ ratna āḍhyau iva bhūṣaṇau
iti uktvā jāta nirveda gāḍha vairāgya vāsanaḥ
tṛṣṇām nininda sahasā praśānta anuśaya jvaraḥ
duḥkhāya bata jantūnām tṛṣṇā paribhava āspadam

original: vipralabdho janaḥ sarvo yayā śocatyaharniśam // Bhmj_13.736 //
analyzed: vipralabdhaḥ janaḥ sarvaḥ yayā śocati aharniśam

original: alabdhaṃ vāñchatāṃ vittaṃ labdhaṃ ca parirakṣatām /
analyzed: a labdham vāñchatām vittam labdham ca parirakṣatām

original: naṣṭaṃ ca śocatāṃ puṃsāṃ kadā duḥkhaṃ nivartate // Bhmj_13.737 //
analyzed: naṣṭam ca śocatām puṃsām kadā duḥkham nivartate

original: niṣkāmaśca sakāmaśca matau me svastharogiṇau // Bhmj_13.738 //
analyzed: niṣkāmaḥ ca sa kāmaḥ ca matau me svastha rogiṇau
sa dhanaḥ cintyate rājñā dasyunā sva janena ca

original: vikalaśceti lokena nirdhanaśca na gaṇyate // Bhmj_13.739 //
analyzed: vikalaḥ ca iti lokena nirdhanaḥ ca na gaṇyate
tasmāt saṃtyakta kāmānām saṃtoṣa dhana śālinām
kṣaya udaya vyaya āyāsaiḥ na cetaḥ paribhūyate
idam labdham idam naṣṭam idam lapsye punar dhiyā
idam cintayatām eva jīrṇam āyuḥ śarīriṇām

original: adhunā lobhamunmūlya spṛhāṃ dūre nirasya ca /
analyzed: adhunā lobham unmūlya spṛhām dūre nirasya ca
vīta mohaḥ bhavāmi eṣa muniḥ tulya priya apriyaḥ

original: tyāgo hi hanti vyasanaṃ tathā hi janakaḥ purā /
analyzed: tyāgaḥ hi hanti vyasanam tathā hi janakaḥ purā
dahyamāne pi nagare nā abhajat duḥkha vikriyām
iti dhyātvā ciram maṅkiḥ nirvedāt śānta mānasaḥ
āśā pāśam parityajya param padam avāptavān
maṅki gītāḥ
etat dharmasutaḥ śrutvā punar śantanunandanam
samabhyadhāt katham jantuḥ vīta śokaḥ caret iti
saḥ bravīt śṛṇu bhūpāla prahlādaḥ dānava adhipaḥ
nitya ānandam purā vipram ūce svacchanda cāriṇām
sukha duḥkha śata āvarte vipule smin dhana arṇave
aviluptaḥ katham brahman nitya tuṣṭaḥ bhilakṣyase

original: keyaṃ ślādhyatarā vṛttiḥ ko vāyaṃ vibhavo dhiyaḥ /
analyzed: kā iyam ślādhyatarā vṛttiḥ kaḥ vā ayam vibhavaḥ dhiyaḥ
krīḍā vihārī loke smin yat asaktaḥ na lipyase
iti pṛṣṭaḥ dvijaḥ tena babhāṣe vipula āśayaḥ
taṭa sthaḥ sarva bhāveṣu nitya tṛptaḥ carāmi aham
māyā vilasitam sarvam jānan saṃsāra vibhramam

original: kṣayodayeṣu bhūtānāṃ na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ bhaje // Bhmj_13.750 //
analyzed: kṣaya udayeṣu bhūtānām na duḥkham na sukham bhaje

original: āyuṣāṃ vibhavānāṃ ca bhāvānāṃ ca svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: āyuṣām vibhavānām ca bhāvānām ca svabhāvataḥ
paśyan asāra tām etān na anuśocāmi nirvyathaḥ
bhuñjānaḥ vividhān bhogān nirāhāraḥ kvacid
nagnaḥ cīra ambaraḥ vā api vā
bhuja upadhānaḥ kṣmā śāyī vā

original: samaḥ śamadamābhyāṃ ca dharāmyājagaraṃ vratam // Bhmj_13.753 //
analyzed: samaḥ śama damābhyām ca dharāmi ājagaram vratam
parāvara jñaḥ bhāvānām kūṭasthaḥ vigata spṛhaḥ
tyakta moha bhaya dveṣaḥ carāmi ājagaram vratam
pāptam girati ajagaraḥ kuraṅgam mahiṣam gajam
asaṃprāpteṣu anudvegam vidhatte niścala sthitiḥ
etām ājagarīm vṛttim āśritya vimala āśayaḥ

original: na cintayāmi sattvastho lābhālābhau sukhāsukhe // Bhmj_13.756 //
analyzed: na cintayāmi sattva sthaḥ lābha alābhau sukha asukhe

original: jīvanmuktadaśāṃ tasya prahlādaḥ praśaśaṃsa tām // Bhmj_13.757 //
analyzed: jīvanmukta daśām tasya prahlādaḥ praśaśaṃsa tām
prahlāda brāhmaṇa saṃvādaḥ
etat pāṇḍu sutaḥ śrutvā punar bhīṣmam abhāṣata
kula karma artha buddhīnām pitāmaha kim uttamam
iti pṛṣṭaḥ nṛpatinā babhāṣe jāhnavīsutaḥ
atikramya guṇān sarvān prajñā eva upari vartate
vaiśyau dhana mada ādhmātaḥ syandanena purā vrajan
apātayat kṛśataram munim vartmani kaśyapam
lalat kuṇḍala gaṇḍena sa tena bhuvi pātitaḥ
śocan daridram ātmānam niścayam nidhane vyadhāt
tam pāṃsu śāyinam dīnam prāṇatyāga kṛta vratam
śakraḥ śṛgāla rūpeṇa kṛpayā vaktum āyayau

original: mune yadujjvalācāro nātmānaṃ bahu manyase // Bhmj_13.763 //
analyzed: mune yat ujjvala ācāraḥ na ātmānam bahu manyase

original: dhanyā manuṣyāḥ saṃsāre yaiḥ svahastena bhujyate /
analyzed: dhanyāḥ manuṣyāḥ saṃsāre yaiḥ sva hastena bhujyate
kaṇḍūḥ nivāryate kīṭa kaṇṭaka ādiḥ vikṛṣyate
aho su kṛtinām rājā tvam yat mānuṣa yoni jaḥ

original: brāhmaṇaśca tapasvī ca spṛhaṇīyo 'si kaśyapa // Bhmj_13.765 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ ca tapasvī ca spṛhaṇīyaḥ si kaśyapa

original: aho dhanyo 'si yannāsvurna maṇḍūko na kukkuṭaḥ /
analyzed: aho dhanyaḥ si yat na asvuḥ na maṇḍūkaḥ na kukkuṭaḥ

original: na pukkaso na cāṇḍālo na kuṣṭī na jaḍo 'si vā // Bhmj_13.766 //
analyzed: na pukkasaḥ na cāṇḍālaḥ na kuṣṭī na jaḍaḥ si vā
dṛśyante dīrgha roga ārtāḥ duḥkhāt duḥkhataram śritāḥ
śocantaḥ tāmasīm yonīm prapannāḥ tān vilokaya
manuṣyaḥ paripūrṇa aṅgaḥ vyādhi vyasana varjitaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ ca tvam uditaḥ tvattaḥ dhanyataraḥ sti kaḥ
asaṃtoṣe matim mohāt mā kṛthāḥ vibhava āśayā
prāpya indra tām api janaḥ tatas pi ādhikyam īhate
tṛṣṇā iyam satata abhyāsāt vardhamānā śarīriṇām
antra snāyu mayī tantrī kṛṣṭā iva āyāti dīrgha tām
tasmāt svadharma nirataḥ spṛhaṇīyaḥ kula udgataḥ

original: parasya vibhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā na kāmānmartumarhasi // Bhmj_13.771 //
analyzed: parasya vibhavam dṛṣṭvā na kāmāt martum arhasi
aham ku tārkikaḥ bhūtvā dhūma agni prāya vāda bhṛt
veda dveṣī nāstikaḥ ca pāpa yonim imām śritaḥ
asmin śarīre bahuśas nirviṇṇaḥ bhayāt aham

original: na tyajāmi tanuṃ pāpa yonayaḥ santyato 'dhikāḥ // Bhmj_13.773 //
analyzed: na tyajāmi tanum pāpa yonayaḥ santi atas dhikāḥ
iti buddhyā surapatiḥ vīta śokam vidhāya tam

original: rūpaṃ ca darśayitvāsmai prayayau tridaśālayam // Bhmj_13.774 //

original: ciraṃ vicārya karmāmi sa karoti yadā tadā /
analyzed: ciram vicārya sa karoti yadā tadā

original: alaso dīrghadarśī ca mūrkhairiti viḍambyate // Bhmj_13.967 //
analyzed: alasaḥ dīrghadarśī ca mūrkhaiḥ iti viḍambyate

ciram nidadhyau saṃdeha dolā viślatha mānasaḥ

iti abhūt duḥkha kaluṣaḥ patitaḥ dharma saṃśaye
tāvat cintā paraḥ saḥ bhūt yāvat tasya pitā svayam
paścāttāpam anuprāptaḥ nijām ājñām avārayat

original: mātaraṃ guruvākyaṃ ca vimarśo hi śubhāspadam // Bhmj_13.971 //
analyzed: mātaram guru vākyam ca vimarśaḥ hi śubha āspadam

original: iti pṛṣṭo narendreṇa punaḥ śāntanavo 'bravīt // Bhmj_13.972 //

original: asāmarthyena viprāṇāṃ nigṛhyante yathā tathā // Bhmj_13.974 //
analyzed: a sāmarthyena viprāṇām nigṛhyante yathā tathā
ekasya hi vadhena eva te bhāryā putra bāndhavāḥ
hatāḥ bhavanti bahavaḥ tasmāt daṇḍaḥ vivecyate

laghu daṇḍāḥ purā abhūvan mṛdavaḥ lpa druhaḥ janāḥ
adya kāla viparyāsāt vadhya daṇḍe pi a saṃyatāḥ
iti āsīt rāja putrasya rājñaḥ ca paribhāṣaṇam

original: nivṛtte ca pravṛtte ca dharme dharmavidāṃ vara // Bhmj_13.978 //

dyumatsena upākhyānam   /

original: nivṛttaṃ ca pravṛttaṃ ca dharmaṃ pṛṣṭo 'tha bhūbhujā /

vyājahāra ubhayoḥ tattvam draṣṭā śantanunandanaḥ

original: nahuṣasya purā saure sattre gāṃ yūpasaṃgatām /

original: svecchācāro dvijo yogī vilokya kapilo 'bravīt // Bhmj_13.980 //
analyzed: svecchā ācāraḥ dvijaḥ yogī vilokya kapilaḥ bravīt

original: yajeta dadyādityeṣā na śrutā kiṃ śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: yajeta dadyāt iti eṣā na śrutā kim śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ

original: tārayatyeva tamaso dravyayāgo hi bandhanam // Bhmj_13.984 //
analyzed: tārayati eva tamasaḥ dravya yāgaḥ hi bandhanam

varam dharma artha ikāmānām kim iti kṣmābhujā punar

dhana arthī brāhmaṇaḥ kaścid devān ārādhya niṣphalaḥ

original: siṣeve kuṇḍadhārākhyaṃ bhaktyā jñānadharaṃ ciram // Bhmj_13.987 //
analyzed: siṣeve kuṇḍadhāra ākhyam bhaktyā jñāna dharam ciram
tuṣṭe tasmin dadarśa atha svapne vaiśravaṇālaye
maṇibhadram dhana cayān vitarantam yathocitam
kuṇḍadhāraḥ tam abhyetya brāhmaṇa artham ayācata
kuṇḍadhārasya yogena brāhmaṇaḥ hita kāriṇā
varāt nirvedam āpannaḥ dharmavān tapase yayau
nabhaḥ caraḥ divya dṛṣṭiḥ saḥ bhavat tapasā kṛtī
evam sāraḥ trivargasya dharmaḥ śubha phala pradaḥ
artha kāma prasaktānām nṛpāṇām narake sthitim

original: niśamya kuryātko nāma na dharmopārjane matim // Bhmj_13.991 //
analyzed: niśamya kuryāt kaḥ nāma na dharma upārjane matim
kuṇḍadhāra upākhyānam
ahiṃsā paramaḥ dharmaḥ nirvedaḥ jñāna deśakaḥ

original: sarvatyāgaḥ parā śāntiḥ kāmināṃ tvanyathākhilam // Bhmj_13.992 //
analyzed: sarva tyāgaḥ parā śāntiḥ kāminām tu anyathā akhilam
asitaḥ devalaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ nāradena abravīt purā
aṣṭādaśa ātmakaḥ sa ūṣmā saṃgataḥ pāñcabhautikaḥ
kṣetrajñena punar yāti saṃgamam vṛkṣa pakṣi vat
akṣīṇa vāsanā tantuḥ bhinnaḥ na vimucyate

original: dehī dehaviyoge svaṃ brahma gacchati nirguṇaḥ // Bhmj_13.995 //
analyzed: dehī deha viyoge svam brahma gacchati nirguṇaḥ
nārada asita saṃvādaḥ
prakṣīṇa vāsanā jālaḥ māṇḍavyam janakaḥ bravīt

original: dahyamāne 'pi nagare yasya kiṃcinna dahyate // Bhmj_13.996 //
analyzed: dahyamāne pi nagare yasya kiṃcid na dahyate

original: śoko vivṛddhatṛṣṇāyā goḥ śṛṅgamiva vardhate // Bhmj_13.998 //

brahma prakāśam aviśat dhruvam śāntam anāmayam

original: anirviṇṇaḥ prahṛṣṭaśca jñātā maunī ca mucyate /

budhaḥ iti āha hārītaḥ viśuddha jñāna saṃśrayaḥ
hārītagītāḥ
bhraṣṭa aiśvaryaḥ purā vṛtraḥ śukram gurum abhāṣata
jīvānām karma bandhānām tiṣṭhatām pāñcabhautike
paryāyeṇa bhavanti eva saṃpadaḥ vipadaḥ tathā
niḥspṛhaḥ smi na śocāmi bhaje sāmyam anaśvaram
na yāsyāmi adhunā rāgam avarṇaḥ varṇa saṃgamāt
iti uktvā dānava patiḥ yadṛcchā upagatāt muneḥ

original: sa vijñāyācyutaṃ devaṃ prayayau paramāṃ gatim /

original: rājñā vṛtrakathāṃ pṛṣṭaḥ punaḥ prāha pitāmahaḥ /

original: purā vṛtreṇa vijito raṇe jambhanisūdanaḥ // Bhmj_13.1007 //

original: viṣṇutejo dadhadvajraṃ taṃ jaghāna mahākṛtim // Bhmj_13.1008 //

viratā brahmaṇaḥ vākyāt brahmahatyā sureśvaram

original: yaḥ parvakāle viṭapicchettā yaśca rajasvalām // Bhmj_13.1013 //

original: iti prṛṣṭo narendreṇa vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ // Bhmj_13.1031 //

original: satīsaṃrakṣito lebhe na ca vai pūrvavatsthitim // Bhmj_13.1054 //

original: na caratyavaṭe tasya karmaṇo 'pi sukhaṃ sadā // Bhmj_13.1056 //

original: tamase duḥkhamevaiṣāṃ bandhāya mahate tamaḥ // Bhmj_13.1057 //

prajāpatiḥ haṃsa rūpī rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ bravīt purā
