original: tadā tasya sa yajñe 'gniḥ prāyātkopādadarśanam // Bhmj_13.1248 //
analyzed: tadā tasya sa yajñe gniḥ prāyāt kopāt adarśanam
ṛtvigbhiḥ atha saptārciḥ niyamena prasāditaḥ

original: svapne jagāda taṃ mahyaṃ kanyaiṣā dīyatāmiti // Bhmj_13.1249 //
analyzed: svapne jagāda tam mahyam kanyā eṣā dīyatām iti
tatas pratyakṣa vapuṣe tasmai rājā su darśanāt
prahṛṣṭaḥ tanayām prādāt prāpya tad saṃnidhim makhe
rājñā tena arthitaḥ dyā api māhiṣmatyām hutāśanaḥ
āste sadā saṃnihitaḥ kṣapayan sarva viplavān
sudarśanāyām nayaḥ babhūva atha vibhāvasoḥ
kāntaḥ sudarśanaḥ nāma guṇa ratna mahodadhiḥ

original: sutā moghavato rājñaḥ kāntāṃ moghavatīṃ yuvā /
analyzed: sutāḥ moghavataḥ rājñaḥ kāntām moghavatīm yuvā

original: sa lebhe kṣīṇāvāṇasya navā śaktiṃ manobhuvaḥ // Bhmj_13.1253 //
analyzed: sa lebhe kṣīṇā vāṇasya navā śaktim manobhuvaḥ

original: tayā saha kurukṣetre gṛhī dharmapade sthitaḥ /
analyzed: tayā saha kurukṣetre gṛhī dharma pade sthitaḥ
cakre mṛtyu jaye yatnam saḥ ṛthi kalpadrumaḥ tadā
a bhagna praṇayāḥ kāryāḥ sarvathā arthi manorathāḥ

original: ityūce sa sadā jāyāṃ dharmasabrahmacāriṇīm // Bhmj_13.1255 //
analyzed: iti ūce sa sadā jāyām dharma sabrahmacāriṇīm
dharmāt acyavataḥ tasya chidra apekṣī sadā abhavat
pracchannaḥ sarvatas mṛtyuḥ na ca antaram avāptavān
tatas kadācid idhma artham svayam yāte sudarśane
atithiḥ kaścid abhyetya tad bhāryām brāhmaṇaḥ bravīt

original: ātithyaṃ kriyatāṃ subhru rājaputri mama tvayā /
analyzed: ātithyam kriyatām subhru rāja putri mama tvayā

original: yadi dharmaḥ pramāṇaṃ te tanmāṃ bhaja sulocane // Bhmj_13.1258 //
analyzed: yadi dharmaḥ pramāṇam te tat mām bhaja su locane
iti bruvāṇaḥ sa tayā vāritaḥ pyapaiḥ arvaraiḥ
tvām nināḥ na arthaye kiṃcid iti uvāca asakṛt dvijaḥ

original: dharmyaṃ tataḥ sā vacanaṃ smṛtvā bhartuḥ pativratā /
analyzed: dharmyam tatas sā vacanam smṛtvā bhartuḥ pativratā
tathā iti uktvā akarot sarvam brāhmaṇasya samīhitam
asmin avasare geha dvāram etya sudarśanaḥ
ehi iti āhūya dayitām sa utkaṇṭhā vyalambata

original: sā bhartrā sahasāhūtā na ca prāptā dvijāntikam /
analyzed: sā bhartrā sahasā āhūtā na ca prāptā dvija antikam
dolā vilola hṛdayā tasthau lajjā ākulā kṣaṇam
tatas gṛha antarāt vipraḥ sudarśanam abhāṣata

original: iyaṃ mayā tava vadhūrarthitātithinā ratam // Bhmj_13.1263 //
analyzed: iyam mayā tava vadhūḥ arthitā atithinā ratam

original: prāptā nādyāpi śayanaṃ prāptaśca tvaṃ gṛhādhipaḥ /
analyzed: prāptāḥ na adya api śayanam prāptaḥ ca tvam gṛha adhipaḥ

original: kimatra manyase yuktamityuktvā virarāma saḥ // Bhmj_13.1264 //
analyzed: kim atra manyase yuktam iti uktvā virarāma saḥ
atrā antare channa vapuḥ mṛtyuḥ ādāya mudgaram
labdhaḥ vakāśaḥ iti uktvā babhūva ānanda nirbharaḥ
tatas sudarśanaḥ vipram uvāca avikṛta āśayaḥ

original: niḥśaṅko madgirā brahmanramasva mama bhāryayā // Bhmj_13.1266 //
analyzed: niḥśaṅkaḥ mad girā brahman ramasva mama bhāryayā
iti ukte vahni putreṇa gaganāt sādhu sādhu iti

original: śabdo babhūva vipulaḥ sahasā tridivaukasām // Bhmj_13.1267 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ babhūva vipulaḥ sahasā tridivaukasām
atithiḥ vipra rūpam sa parityajya mahā ākṛtiḥ

original: uvāca mahasāṃ rāśiḥ prītyābhyetya sudarśanam // Bhmj_13.1268 //
analyzed: uvāca mahasām rāśiḥ prītyā abhyetya sudarśanam
dharmaḥ ham dampatī prāptaḥ yuvām jijñāsuḥ āśrame

original: aṃkhaṇḍitaṃ ca yuvayordṛṣṭaṃ sattvamidaṃ mayā // Bhmj_13.1269 //
analyzed: aṃkhaṇḍitam ca yuvayoḥ dṛṣṭam sattvam idam mayā

original: adhṛṣṭa tejasā ceyaṃ tvadbhāryā kena laṅghyate /
analyzed: adhṛṣṭa tejasā ca iyam tvad bhāryā kena laṅghyate
dvidhā ātmānam vibhajya eṣā yogena oghavatī nadī

original: bhaviṣyati kṣitau puṇyā nityaṃ tvāṃ cānuyāsyati // Bhmj_13.1270 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati kṣitau puṇyā nityam tvām ca anuyāsyati
iti uktvā antardadhe dharmaḥ mṛtyuḥ ca vimukhaḥ yayau

original: sa ca vīro divaṃ prāpa sabhāryaśca sudarśanaḥ // Bhmj_13.1271 //
analyzed: sa ca vīraḥ divam prāpa sa bhāryaḥ ca sudarśanaḥ
sudarśana upākhyānam
viśvāmitreṇa saṃprāptam brāhmaṇyam durlabham katham
pṛṣṭaḥ yudhiṣṭhireṇa iti gāṅgeyaḥ punar abravīt
kuśikasya purā rājñaḥ śrīmān gādhiḥ sutaḥ bhavat
putrī satyavatī nāma tasya abhūt mṛga locanā
ṛcīkaḥ tām muni varaḥ śulka labhyām avāptavān
hayānām śyāma karṇānām sahasreṇa indu varcasām
sa tayā śīla śālinyā yatna dā ārādhitaḥ muniḥ

original: yācitastu varaṃ tuṣṭaḥ putraṃ mātustathātmanaḥ // Bhmj_13.1275 //
analyzed: yācitaḥ tu varam tuṣṭaḥ putram mātuḥ tathā ātmanaḥ
tvam aśvattham samāliṅgya tava mātā api udumbaram

original: caruṃ ca prāpya maddattaṃ putriṇītyavadanmuniḥ // Bhmj_13.1276 //
analyzed: carum ca prāpya mad dattam putriṇī iti avadat muniḥ
varam evam samāsādya hṛṣṭā mātre nyavedayat

original: tadgirā vyatyayaṃ cakre vṛkṣayoḥ pāyase tathā // Bhmj_13.1277 //
analyzed: tad girā vyatyayam cakre vṛkṣayoḥ pāyase tathā
tat ca jñātvā muniḥ jāyām uvāca jñāna locanaḥ

original: tvanmāturbrāhmaṇaḥ putraḥ kṣatrātmā te bhaviṣyati // Bhmj_13.1278 //
analyzed: tvad mātuḥ brāhmaṇaḥ putraḥ kṣatra ātmā te bhaviṣyati

original: tacchrutvā duḥkhasaṃtaptā yayāce sā muniṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: tat śrutvā duḥkha saṃtaptā yayāce sā munim punar

original: kṣatrācārastu me pautro mā putra iti mūrchitā // Bhmj_13.1279 //
analyzed: kṣatra ācāraḥ tu me pautraḥ mā putraḥ iti mūrchitā
evam astu iti tena ukte lebhe satyavatī sutam
jamadagnim sutaḥ ca asya rāmaḥ bhūt kṣatriya ucitaḥ
gādhi patnī ca kālena viśvāmitram ajījanat
vṛkṣa pāyasayoḥ yaḥ bhūt vyatyayāt brāhmaṇāgraṇīḥ
viśvāmitra utpattiḥ
ānṛśaṃsya guṇam rājñā punar pṛṣṭaḥ suravrataḥ
uvāca kānane pūrvam ghana chāyaḥ bhavat drumaḥ
sa viddhaḥ viṣa dagdhena śarema mṛga gāminā

original: lubdhakena yayau śoṣaṃ spṛṣṭo dāvānalairiva // Bhmj_13.1283 //
analyzed: lubdhakena yayau śoṣam spṛṣṭaḥ dāva analaiḥ iva
tam parityajya yāteṣu niṣphalam sarva patriṣu

original: eka eva śukastaśthau sātaṃ prītiracañcalā // Bhmj_13.1284 //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva sātam prītiḥ acañcalā
nidāgha ploṣa paruṣe phala pumpa vivarjite

original: sthitaṃ tatra śukaṃ vīkṣya śakro 'bhyetya tamabravīt // Bhmj_13.1285 //
analyzed: sthitam tatra śukam vīkṣya śakraḥ bhyetya tam abravīt
svaccha chāyā phala ādyeṣu vṛkṣeṣu vigata dyutiḥ

original: kiṃ tvayāyaṃ śritaḥ śākhī tyaktvainaḥ cara nirvṛtaḥ // Bhmj_13.1286 //
analyzed: kim tvayā ayam śritaḥ śākhī tyaktvā enaḥ cara nirvṛtaḥ
athā uvāca śukaḥ śakram na idam sadṛśam ucyate

original: samānā sukhaduḥkheṣu sajjanaiḥ saha saṃgatiḥ // Bhmj_13.1287 //
analyzed: samānā sukha duḥkheṣu sat janaiḥ saha saṃgatiḥ

original: yatroṣitaṃ ca bhuktaṃ ca vihṛtaṃ ca yathāsukham /
analyzed: yatra uṣitam ca bhuktam ca vihṛtam ca yathāsukham
tasmin kāla hata aiśvarye palāyante na sādhavaḥ
maghavān etat ākarṇya toṣāt vṛkṣam sudhā kaṇaiḥ
cakāra sahasā uddīrṇa patra puṣpa phala ākulam

original: ānṛśaṃsyātsa ca śukaḥ prayayau paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: ānṛśaṃsyāt sa ca śukaḥ prayayau paramām gatim

original: evaṃ dākṣiṇyasadṛśo nāparo vidyate guṇaḥ // Bhmj_13.1290 //
analyzed: evam dākṣiṇya sadṛśaḥ na aparaḥ vidyate guṇaḥ
śuka śakra saṃvādaḥ
daivam sa pauruṣam rājñā bhīṣmaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ bravīt punar

original: ubhayoḥ saṃgamaḥ siddhyai viyogo niṣphalo 'nayoḥ // Bhmj_13.1291 //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ saṃgamaḥ siddhyai viyogaḥ niṣphalaḥ nayoḥ

original: anuptabīje kṛṣṭe 'pi daivaṃ kṣetre karoti kim /
analyzed: an upta bīje kṛṣṭe daivam kṣetre karoti kim

original: pauruṣaṃ karma puruṣairyathā yatra yadā kṛtam /
analyzed: pauruṣam karma puruṣaiḥ yathā yatra yadā kṛtam

original: tathā tatra tadābhyetya visaṃvādo na dṛśyate // Bhmj_13.1292 //
analyzed: tathā tatra tadā abhyetya visaṃvādaḥ na dṛśyate
dātṝṇām puṇya śīlānām vratinām satya vādinām
dṛśyante dhanya tāḥ tāḥ tāḥ rājya svargati bhūtibhiḥ
daivapurukārīyam   /
ke pūjyāḥ iti pārthena pṛṣṭaḥ vādīt suravrataḥ

original: sadā dvijātayaḥ pūjyāste sarvatra parāyaṇam // Bhmj_13.1294 //
analyzed: sadā dvijātayaḥ pūjyāḥ te sarvatra parāyaṇam
narau janmāntare pūrvam kapi jambuka tām gatau

original: jātismarau dadṛśatuḥ śmaśānaṃ suhṛdau mithaḥ // Bhmj_13.1295 //
analyzed: jātismarau dadṛśatuḥ śmaśānam suhṛdau mithas
tatra ūce vānaraḥ premṇā śṛgālam svinna mānasaḥ
karmaṇā kena yātaḥ si śava māṃsa āśi tām iti

original: pratiśrutya mayā pūrvaṃ na vitīrṇaṃ dvijanmane /
analyzed: pratiśrutya mayā pūrvam na vitīrṇam dvijanmane
sārgālīm yonim āpannaḥ tena aham iti saḥ bravīt
etat eva śṛgālena pṛṣṭa provāca vānaraḥ
brāhmaṇān avamanya aham prayāntaḥ kapi tām iti
brāhmaṇa atikrameṇa eva bhajante tāmasīm daśām
tasmāt sarva ātmanā viprāḥ pūjyāḥ kuśalam icchatā

original: asavarṇopadeṣṭāraḥ kiṃ na syuḥ śreyasāṃ padam /
analyzed: asavarṇa upadeṣṭāraḥ kim na syuḥ śreyasām padam

original: viprā iti punaḥ pṛṣṭo rājñā śāntanavo 'bravīt // Bhmj_13.1300 //
analyzed: viprāḥ iti punar pṛṣṭaḥ rājñā śāntanavaḥ bravīt
purā vane śūdra muneḥ brahmarṣiḥ abhavat sakhā
kadācid saḥ ṛthitaḥ śrāddhe śūdreṇa agāt tad āśramam
pitṛ karmaṇi tasya asau havya kavya upadeśa kṛt
pūrvam śeṣām vṛsīm etām kuruṣva iti avadat muniḥ
tatas kālena mahatā kṣapayitvā kalevaram
karma śeṣa upabhogāya tau janmāntaram āpatuḥ
sa sūdraḥ bhūt kṣitipatiḥ sa brahmarṣiḥ purohitaḥ
tasya rājñaḥ bhavat lapta jñānaḥ naṣṭa akhila smṛtiḥ
svasti puṇyāha vādeṣu nṛpaḥ jātismaraḥ satām

original: sadā jahāsa taccāsau nṛpaṃ papraccha lajjitaḥ // Bhmj_13.1305 //
analyzed: sadā jahāsa tat ca asau nṛpam papraccha lajjitaḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ śapatha dānena bhūpatiḥ hāsa kāraṇam

original: purohitaṃ rahaḥ prāha śūdro 'hamabhavaṃ purā // Bhmj_13.1306 //
analyzed: purohitam rahaḥ prāha śūdraḥ ham abhavam purā
brahmarṣiḥ ca bhavān mahyam upadeśam vyadhāt sakṛt
tena adya suravandyaḥ pi prāptaḥ sī anucitām daśām

original: śrutvaitatsahasā smṛtvā tapase sa yayau muniḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā etat sahasā smṛtvā tapase sa yayau muniḥ
evam na eva upadeṣṭā syāt avarāṇām dvijottamaḥ
guru upadiṣṭam
kaḥ śriyaḥ bhājanam iti kṣmābhujā jāhnavīsutaḥ

original: pṛṣṭaḥ prāha hareragre rukmiṇīṃ śrīḥ purābhyadhāt // Bhmj_13.1309 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ prāha hareḥ agre rukmiṇīm śrīḥ purā abhyadhāt
subhageṣu pragalbheṣu dakṣeṣu ujjvala karmasu

original: jitendriyeṣu vīreṣu prītyā me śāśvatī sthitiḥ // Bhmj_13.1310 //
analyzed: jita indriyeṣu vīreṣu prītyā me śāśvatī sthitiḥ
utseka lobha saṃtrāsa dainya krodha vinākṛtāḥ

original: kṛtajñāḥ kelisadanaṃ sadācārāḥ sadā mama // Bhmj_13.1311 //
analyzed: kṛtajñāḥ keli sadanam sat ācārāḥ sadā mama
pativratām a kalahām a laulyām a kutūhalām

original: aviprakīrṇabhāṇḍāṃ ca gatanidrāṃ bhaje striyam // Bhmj_13.1312 //
analyzed: a viprakīrṇa bhāṇḍām ca gata nidrām bhaje striyam
matteṣu kuñjara indreṣu hayeṣu vṛṣabheṣu ca
phulla aravinda vṛndeṣu śarad candra kareṣu ca
nadīṣu haṃsa hāsāsu rājat rāja raṇeṣu ca

original: vaneṣu munipuṇyeṣu yajñeṣu ca vasāmyaham // Bhmj_13.1314 //
analyzed: vaneṣu muni puṇyeṣu yajñeṣu ca vasāmi aham
etat śrutvā punar bhīṣmam apṛcchat pāṇḍu nandanaḥ

original: sparśādhikyaṃ kimu strīṇāṃ nṛṇāṃ vā saṃgameṣviti // Bhmj_13.1315 //
analyzed: sparśa ādhikyam kimu strīṇām nṛṇām vā saṃgameṣu iti
saḥ bravīt abhavat yajvā bhṛṅgāśvaḥ nāma bhūpatiḥ
yaśaḥ kusuma vallīṣu yaḥ bhūt saṃtata mādhavaḥ
pratikūlam sa śaktasya yajñam agniṣṭutam punar

original: ājahāra jagāmāsya śatrutāṃ yena vāsavaḥ // Bhmj_13.1317 //
analyzed: ājahāra jagāma asya śatru tām yena vāsavaḥ
sa kadācid mṛga prepsuḥ vājinā vipine vrajan
indreṇa mohitaḥ vatsa na ajñāsīt tṛṣṇayā arditaḥ
saḥ paśyat agre vipulam saraḥ sphaṭika nirmalam
lola kallola dolā aṅkam keli veśma himatviṣaḥ
tasmin sa sahasā snātaḥ pāyayitvā turaṅgamam
abhavat lalanā rūpaḥ pīna śroṇi payodharaḥ
sa lajjā duḥkha vivaśaḥ gatvā aśvena nijām purīm

original: nivedya nijavṛttāntaṃ rājye putraśataṃ vyadhāt // Bhmj_13.1321 //
analyzed: nivedya nija vṛttāntam rājye putra śatam vyadhāt
strī rūpaḥ saḥ tha vijanam tyakta rājyaḥ tapaḥ vanam
prayayau kalayan antar vidheḥ utsāha vāma tām
tatra tam kāminī rūpam akāmayata tāpasaḥ

original: patanti ṣaṭpadāstatra yatra yatra sarojinī // Bhmj_13.1323 //
analyzed: patanti ṣaṭpadāḥ tatra yatra yatra sarojinī
tasmāt asūta putrāṇām sa śatam bala śālinām
kāntā vapuḥ abhūt nityam teṣu ca atyanta vatsalaḥ
pūrva putrān atha abhyetya puṃstva jātān uvāca saḥ
strī tva jātaiḥ sutaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ vasudhā saha bhujyatām
tad girā miśra tām yātam tatas putra śata dvayam
bubhuje bhuvam amlāna yaśaḥ vikrama śāsanām
atrā antare samabhyetya vipra rūpī śatakratuḥ
bhedena rāja putrāṇām vidadhe kalaha udayam
tatas te yudhi saṃnaddhāḥ rājya hetoḥ parasparam

original: kṛtvā sainyakṣayaṃ ghoraṃ niḥśeṣāḥ pralayaṃ yayuḥ // Bhmj_13.1328 //
analyzed: kṛtvā sainya kṣayam ghoram niḥśeṣāḥ pralayam yayuḥ
bhedāt prayāte nidhanam yudhi putra śata dvaye
bhṛṅgāśvaḥ lalanā rūpaḥ śuśoca karuma svanam
tam indraḥ brāhmaṇa vapūḥ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca tad kathām
pralīna manyuḥ kāruṇyāt uvāca vihasan muhur
śakraḥ ham tava putrāḥ te mayā vipriya kāriṇaḥ

original: bheditā nādhunā vairamāpanne tvayi me nṛpa // Bhmj_13.1331 //
analyzed: bheditāḥ na adhunā vairam āpanne tvayi me nṛpa
putrāṇām śatam ekam te mad varāt adya jīvatu

original: yattvamicchasi jātaṃ prāk puṃsaḥ strīvapuṣo 'thavā // Bhmj_13.1332 //
analyzed: yat tvam icchasi jātam prāk puṃsaḥ strī vapuṣaḥ
iti ukte devarājena bhṛṅgāśvaḥ tam ayācata
jīvitam strī tva jātānām putrāṇām praṇata ānanaḥ
tam abravīt surapatiḥ puṃs tva jātān katham sutān

original: tyaktvā strītvaprajāteṣu putreṣu snihyati bhavān // Bhmj_13.1334 //
analyzed: tyaktvā strī tva prajāteṣu putreṣu snihyati bhavān
iti pṛṣṭaḥ maghavatā babhāṣe strī vapuḥ nṛpaḥ
sneha vātsalya rāgāṇām lalanā eva mandiram
śrutvā etat avadat śakraḥ sarve jīvantu te sutāḥ

original: strīrūpaṃ tu parityajya puruṣo bhava madvarāt // Bhmj_13.1336 //
analyzed: strī rūpam tu parityajya puruṣaḥ bhava mad varāt
iti uktaḥ pārthivaḥ vādīt strī tvam nā eva tyajāmi aham

original: strīṇāṃ sparśeṣu yā prītiḥ sā puṃbhirlabhyate kutaḥ // Bhmj_13.1337 //
analyzed: strīṇām sparśeṣu yā prītiḥ sā puṃbhiḥ labhyate kutas
daivāt samanubhūya idam su ciram prakṛti dvayam
etāvat eva jāne ham yat prīteḥ bhājanam striyaḥ

original: kāmasya sāraṃ surataṃ ratasya sparśāmṛtaṃ tacca sulocanānām /
analyzed: kāmasya sāram suratam ratasya sparśa amṛtam tat ca su locanānām

original: sarvātmanā nirvṛtijīvaśūnyaṃ bhave bhave jīvitameva kāntāḥ // Bhmj_13.1339 //
analyzed: sarva ātmanā nirvṛti jīva śūnyam bhave bhave jīvitam eva kāntāḥ
yathārtham iti tena uktam niśamya vibudha adhipaḥ
jagāma jīvayitvā asya prītaḥ putra śata dvayam
bhṛṅgāśva upākhyānam
śrutvā etat dharmatanayaḥ punar gāṅgeyam abravīt
māhātmyam śrotum icchāmi devasya tripuradviṣaḥ
iti pṛṣṭaḥ narendreṇa vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ
māhātmyam devadevasya vaktum arhati keśavaḥ

original: harireva haraṃ vetti haro vetti tathā harim /
analyzed: hariḥ eva haram vetti haraḥ vetti tathā harim
ekā eva mūrtiḥ anayoḥ kāraṇāt dvaitam āśritā
iti devavratena ukte murāriḥ dhrama janmanā
pṛṣṭaḥ śaśāṅka cūḍasya prabhāvam prayataḥ vadat

original: putrārthinī jāmbavatī priyā provāca māṃ purā /
analyzed: putra arthinī jāmbavatī priyā provāca mām purā
pradyumna sadṛśam deva tvattaḥ putra guṇa ucitam

original: prāptumicchāmi saṃkalpaḥ pūryatāmeṣa me tvayā // Bhmj_13.1345 //
analyzed: prāptum icchāmi saṃkalpaḥ pūryatām eṣa me tvayā
iti uktaḥ ham dayitayā tayā bāla mṛgī dṛśā
dhyātvā muhūrtam putra arthī prayātam upasevanam
athā āruhya gireḥ śaṅke purā muni tapaḥ vanam
apaśyam tejasām rāśim upamanyum nija āśrame
prahṛṣṭam jyeṣṭha vayasam pināki vara bhūṣitam
dīptam tapobhiḥ vividhaiḥ pūrṇa lāvaṇya vigraham
praśānta ramaṇīyena satvena ānanda dāyinā
kirantam madhura udāra nirvāṇa amṛta vāhinīm
tam vilokya praṇamya aham pūjām ādāya tad kṛtām
tad saṃbhāṣaṇa saṃjāta para ānanda mayaḥ bhavam
sa mām uvāca praṇatam prītyā jñāna vilocanaḥ
devam giriśam ārādhya tulyam putram avāpsyasi
te te trailokya jayinaḥ sukeśi pramukāḥ purā
śrūyante śaṃkara varāt prāptāḥ śakra adhikam padam
purā asmin vyāghrapādasya mahā ṛṣeḥ pituḥ āśrame

original: sakṛdāsvādya gokṣīraṃ yācitā jananī mayā // Bhmj_13.1353 //
analyzed: sakṛt āsvādya go kṣīram yācitā jananī mayā
payasaḥ saṃbhavāt mātrā dattam piṣṭa rasam tatas
pītvā aham virasam duḥkhāt abhavam sa aśru locanaḥ

original: athābravīnmāṃ jananī vane putra payaḥ kutaḥ /
analyzed: athā bravīt mām jananī vane putra payaḥ kutas

original: śrīkaṇṭhaṃ na hyanārādhya labhyate 'bhimataṃ kvacit // Bhmj_13.1355 //
analyzed: śrīkaṇṭham na hi an ārādhya labhyate bhimatam kvacid
iti mātuḥ vacaḥ śrutvā prayātaḥ smi tapaḥ vane
yatnāt akaravam tīvram tapaḥ vārṣa sahasrikam
na anyatas prārthaye śakra varam prāptam api svayam
pīyūṣa kiraṇa uttaṃsāt devāt anyatra dhūrjaṭeḥ

original: tenālaṃ surarājyena kiṃ mokṣeṇāpi tena me /
analyzed: tena alam sura rājyena kim mokṣeṇa api tena me
nirvyāja bhakti dayitaḥ dātā yasmin na śaṃkaraḥ
iti uktaḥ bahuśas śakraḥ mayā bharga anurāgiṇā
rūpam aindram parityajya babhūva vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
śūlinam jaṭinam devam vīkṣya candra kalā dharam
abhavam nirbhara ānanda prasarat bāṣpa nirjharaḥ

original: tataḥ stuto mayā śaṃbhurmahyaṃ kṣīrodadhiṃ dadau /
analyzed: tatas stutaḥ mayā śaṃbhuḥ mahyam kṣīrodadhim dadau
ādadhe ca āśrame tasmin saṃkalpāt mama saṃnidhim
tam tvam ārādhya vara dam tapasā pārvatīpatim

original: labhakha tanayaṃ kṛṣṇa tasyātmā tvaṃ sa vā tava // Bhmj_13.1362 //
analyzed: labhakha tanayam kṛṣṇa tasya ātmā tvam sa vā tava
uktvā evam upamanyuḥ mām dīkṣitam śiva śāsane
ādideśa tapaḥ yoge rahasyam gṛhyatām iti
mantreṇa tad vitīrṇena tapasā ca samāhitaḥ
paśyam aham kāle devam candra ardha śekharam
megha jāla samārūḍham vyomni soma śata ujjvalam
tam vilokya abhinandya aham stutvā harṣa paraḥ bhavam
tatas yathā īpsitān dattvā varān mahyam maheśvaraḥ
antardadhe sudhā pūraiḥ āpūrya iva diśaḥ daśā
atha upamanyuḥ mām etya prakṛṣṭam hṛṣṭam abravīt

original: taṇḍiproktāni nāmāni śṛṇu mādhava dhūrjaṭeḥ // Bhmj_13.1367 //
analyzed: taṇḍi proktāni nāmāni śṛṇu mādhava dhūrjaṭeḥ
taṇḍiḥ nāma muniḥ pūrvam guhyaiḥ gītaiḥ svayaṃbhuvā

original: trinetraṃ prayataṃ nāmnāṃ tuṣṭāva daśabhiḥ śataiḥ // Bhmj_13.1368 //
analyzed: trinetram prayatam nāmnām tuṣṭāva daśabhiḥ śataiḥ

original: sthāṇo sthirasthite śaṃbho śarva bhāno varaprada /
analyzed: sthāṇo sthira sthite śaṃbho śarva bhāno vara prada

original: hara rudra smarārāte viśva viśveśvareśvara // Bhmj_13.1369 //
analyzed: hara rudra smara arāte viśva viśva īśvara īśvara
bhava bharga śiva āśvāsa bhavānī vallabha prabho
śaśāṅka śakala uttaṃsa śiva śānta maheśvara
namaḥ tubhyam jagat sarga asthiti saṃhāra kāriṇe
brahma upendra indra vapuṣe triguṇāya trimūrtaye
iti stuti padaiḥ divyaiḥ veda proktaiḥ ca nāmabhiḥ
sahasra saṃkhyaiḥ sa muniḥ tuṣṭāva śaśiśekharam
evam īśvara saṃbaddhāḥ kṛtvā aham muninā kathā
agamam garuḍa ārūḍhaḥ dvārakam harṣa nirbharaḥ
jāmbavatyāḥ tatas śrīmān vaṃśa muktāmaṇiḥ sutaḥ
sāmbaḥ bhavat guṇān yasya jānīṣe dharmanandana
iti kṛṣṇena kathitam śrutvā bhīṣma sabhāsadaḥ

original: munayo manasā devaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ vavandire // Bhmj_13.1375 //
analyzed: munayaḥ manasā devam nīlakaṇṭham vavandire
meghavāhanaparva
capalāḥ sahacāriṇyaḥ katham jāyāḥ nṛṇām iti

original: punaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitibhujā babhāṣe jāhnivīsutaḥ // Bhmj_13.1376 //
analyzed: punar pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitibhujā babhāṣe jāhnivīsutaḥ
aṣṭāvakraḥ muniḥ pūrvam vivāha arthī su locanām

original: apaśyatsuprabhāṃ nāma vadanyasya muneḥ sutām // Bhmj_13.1377 //
analyzed: apaśyat suprabhām nāma vadanyasya muneḥ sutām
indu kunda aṅkura ākāra sukumāratara ākṛtim

original: sa tāmālokya sumukhīṃ yayāce sotsuko munim // Bhmj_13.1378 //
analyzed: sa tām ālokya su mukhīm yayāce sa utsukaḥ munim
tam vadanyaḥ vadat gaccha viśālām diśam uttarām
atikramya kuberasya bhavanam bhava sevitam
tatas pratinivṛttāya tubhyam dāsyāmi suprabhām

original: ityuktaḥ sa vadanyena prataśte tāṃ diśaṃ śanaiḥ // Bhmj_13.1380 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa vadanyena prataśte tām diśam śanais
tatas himādrim ullaṅkhya bāhudām ca mahā nadīm

original: aśoke vimale snātvā rudrāṇī kūpamāptavān // Bhmj_13.1381 //
analyzed: aśoke vimale snātvā rudrāṇī kūpam āptavān
sa kailāsa taṭam prāpya dadarśa dhanada ālayam
hema paṅkajinī tīra lasat kalpalatā vanam
sa ādaram pūjitaḥ tena rājñā vaiśravaṇena saḥ
uvāsa vatsaram sāgram vilāsa maṇi veśmasu
ciram apsarasām nṛttaiḥ gītaiḥ gandharva yoṣitām
prītim āsādya vipulām āmantrya dhanadam yayau
giri indrān ullaṅghya samām maṇi mayīm bhuvam
avatīrya ghana chāyam pāpa ratna latā vanam
hema puṣkariṇī śīte sa tasmin divya kānane
maṇi mauktika jāla aṅgam dadarśa udāra mandiram
sā u tha dvāra agram abhyetya tasya vaiḍūrya veśmanaḥ
prāptaḥ ham atithiḥ dūrāt iti ūce saṃśraya āśayā
tatas sapta vinirgatya kanyāḥ kamala locanāḥ
divya bhūṣaṇa saṃpannāḥ tasya ātithyam pracakrire
gṛham praveśitaḥ tābhiḥ hema ratna āsana ujjvalam
dadarśa maṇi paryaṅke vṛddhām bhāsvara bhūṣaṇām
tayā madhura vādinyā prāpya nirdiṣṭam āsanam
gata klamaḥ kṣaṇam tasthau muniḥ vismaya niścalaḥ

original: dinānte so 'tha tāḥ prāha yāntu sarvāḥ svamālayam /
analyzed: dina ante saḥ tha tāḥ prāha yāntu sarvāḥ svam ālayam

original: ekaiva śāntahṛdayā paricaryāṃ karotu me // Bhmj_13.1391 //
analyzed: ekā eva śānta hṛdayā paricaryām karotu me
iti ukte muninā sarvāḥ prayayuḥ tāḥ su locanāḥ

original: ekaiva jaratī tatra sthau śaśisitāṃśukā // Bhmj_13.1392 //
analyzed: ekā eva jaratī tatra sthau śaśi sita aṃśukā
suṣvāpa śayane sparśa śālini
vitāna ālambi mandāra dāmni su accha uttaracchade
dvitīya śayanāt vṛddhā samutthāya tatas śanais
muneḥ śayyā antikam pāyāt nibhṛtāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ
kampamāna tanuḥ sā atha śayyām āruhya viklavā
munim śīta apadeśena nibiḍam pariṣasvaje
āliṅgyamānaḥ sa tayā tasthau kāṣṭham iva acalaḥ
para dāra pariṣvaṅga śaṅkā sakta cita āśayaḥ
sā atha tam sparśa vimukham praṇayāt mañju vādinī

original: uvāca bhogasaṃkalpabhaṅgaṃ mā me kṛthāḥ prabho // Bhmj_13.1397 //
analyzed: uvāca bhoga saṃkalpa bhaṅgam mā me kṛthāḥ prabho
idam me ratna bhavanam cāru ratna latā vanam

original: tvadadhīnamakasmānme ceto hi ramate tvayi // Bhmj_13.1398 //
analyzed: tvad adhīnam akasmāt me cetaḥ hi ramate tvayi

original: na te doṣo 'sti matsaṅge tyājyā naiva tu yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: na te doṣaḥ sti mad saṅge tyājyāḥ nā eva tu yoṣitaḥ

original: durgamaṃ nābhijānanti gaṇayanti na ca śramam // Bhmj_13.1399 //
analyzed: durgamam nā abhijānanti gaṇayanti na ca śramam
prayānti puruṣān eva rāga vāgurayā striyaḥ

original: naitāḥ kulānurodhena nivartante na cerṣyayā // Bhmj_13.1400 //
analyzed: na etāḥ kula anurodhena nivartante na ca īrṣyayā
rāmāsu aruddha prasaraḥ sarvathā makaradhvajaḥ

original: strī satīti pravādo 'yamekasakteti kā kathā // Bhmj_13.1401 //
analyzed: strī satī iti pravādaḥ yam eka saktā iti kā kathā
nara antaram prayānti etāḥ nimna āmnam iva āpagāḥ

original: manmathapreritā nārī vimarṣaṃ bhajate katham // Bhmj_13.1402 //
analyzed: manmatha preritā nārī vimarṣam bhajate katham
yāsām prāṇa paṇena api vallabham surata amṛtam

original: ityarthamāno 'pi tayā nābyanandatsa tāṃ muniḥ // Bhmj_13.1403 //
analyzed: iti arthamānaḥ pi tayā nā abyanandat sa tām muniḥ
anyedyus api sā rātrau tathā eva tam abhāṣata

original: bhajasva svayamāyātāṃ duḥsaho me smarajvaraḥ // Bhmj_13.1404 //
analyzed: bhajasva svayam āyātām duḥsahaḥ me smara jvaraḥ
niṣedhaḥ rati vāñchāsu nidhanam kila yoṣitām

original: ityuktvā nirvikāraṃ taṃ sā dṛṣṭvā punarabraravīt // Bhmj_13.1405 //
analyzed: iti uktvā nirvikāram tam sā dṛṣṭvā punar abraravīt
mām uttarām diśam viddhi strī vṛttāntam pradarśitam

original: adhunā tāṃ vadanyasya gatvā prāpnuhi kanyakām // Bhmj_13.1406 //
analyzed: adhunā tām vadanyasya gatvā prāpnuhi kanyakām
etat ākarṇya sa muniḥ tām āmantrya sa vismayaḥ
śanais pratiyayau jñāna strī vṛttaḥ nijam āśramam
tatas vadanyam abhyetya strī vṛttāntam nivedya tam
avāpa udvāha vidhinā vitīrṇām tena suprabhām
atha vidhi anugam śrāddham pātra apātra kramam tathā

original: rājñā gatiṃ ca tīrthaṃ ca pṛṣṭaḥ śāntanavo 'bravīt // Bhmj_13.1409 //
analyzed: rājñā gatim ca tīrtham ca pṛṣṭaḥ śāntanavaḥ bravīt
yajeta devān pūrvāhṇe śuciḥ śuklaḥ jita indriyaḥ
maṅgala alaṃkṛtam sragvī bhogauḥ suddhaiḥ manoramaiḥ
karma aparāhṇe tu kuryāt prayata mānasaḥ

original: teṣu teṣu ca kāleṣu deśeṣu ca yatāvidhi // Bhmj_13.1411 //
analyzed: teṣu teṣu ca kāleṣu deśeṣu ca yatāvidhi
deśa kāla ādi rahitam śva avalīḍham rasa cyutam
kīṭa kośa asthi saṃspṛṣṭam śrāddham aśnanti rākṣasāḥ
unmattāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ kāṇāḥ kuṣṭhinaḥ vṛṣalī varāḥ
cikitsakāḥ vārdhuṣikāḥ gīta nṛtya ādi jīvinaḥ
hīna adhika aṅgāḥ guravaḥ brahma vikrayiṇaḥ
anagnayaḥ sattra bhujaḥ kṣattriyāḥ kṣetra jīvinaḥ
piśunāḥ vrata hīnāḥ ca veda vidyā vivarjitāḥ

original: parihāryāḥ sadā vipāḥ śrāddhāghnā haitukāstathā // Bhmj_13.1415 //
analyzed: parihāryāḥ sadā vipāḥ śrāddhā ghnāḥ haitukāḥ tathā
para sva hāriṇām puṃsām para dāra abhigāminām
bhagna vratānām lubdhānām niṣiddha krayya jīvinām
vṛtti chedam suhṛd chedam bhartṛ chedam ca kurvatām
vihita ācāra hīnānām nirayaḥ kṣayaḥ
karuṇā pūrṇa manasām tyāginām pātra varṣiṇām
kṣamāvatām āśramiṇām prapā kūpa sabhā kṛtām
yājinām tīrtha pūtānām viduṣām satya vādinām
madya māṃsa viraktānām svarga mārgaḥ nirargalaḥ
gautamena purā pṛṣṭaḥ sarva vid muniḥ aṅgirāḥ

original: uvāca puṇyaṃ tīrthānāṃ tapoyogena sasmitam // Bhmj_13.1420 //
analyzed: uvāca puṇyam tīrthānām tapaḥ yogena sa smitam
candrabhāgā vitastā ca kaśmīra saritaḥ tathā

original: munitulyāṃ gatiṃ puṃsāṃ prayacchantyeva sevitāḥ // Bhmj_13.1421 //
analyzed: muni tulyām gatim puṃsām prayacchanti eva sevitāḥ

original: bhāgīrathīṃ kauśikīṃ ca rāmaṇīṃ narmadāṃ tathā /
analyzed: bhāgīrathīm kauśikīm ca rāmaṇīm narmadām tathā

original: prayāgaṃ nandikuṇḍaṃ ca vipāśaṃ mānasaṃ saraḥ // Bhmj_13.1422 //
analyzed: prayāgam nandikuṇḍam ca vipāśam mānasam saraḥ
puṇya tīrthāni ca anyāni naraḥ prāpya jita indriyaḥ
sarva tīrtha phalam dātā labhate prāc upoṣitaḥ
gaṅgā tu sarva tīrthānām pravaram tīrtham ucyate

original: asthimātre yayā spṛṣṭe nṛṇāṃ svargatirakṣayā // Bhmj_13.1424 //
analyzed: asthi mātre yayā spṛṣṭe nṛṇām svar gatiḥ akṣayā

original: na te deśā na te śailā na te janapadāḥ kṣitau /
analyzed: na te deśāḥ na te śailāḥ na te janapadāḥ kṣitau

original: patākā yasya puṇyasya jāhnavī na vibhāvyate // Bhmj_13.1425 //
analyzed: patākā yasya puṇyasya jāhnavī na vibhāvyate
kim apāya mayaiḥ yajñaiḥ kim tapobhiḥ śrama pradaiḥ
jahnukanyā payaḥ pūtam yadi puṇyavatām vapuḥ
yātā smṛti padam yeṣām bhaṅgāya eva akhila enasām
gaṅgā jalena spṛṣṭānām phalam alpam surālayaḥ
śila uñcha vṛttinā pūrvam siddhaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ bravīt iti
etat aṅgirasā proktam niśamya kila gautamaḥ

original: smṛtvā vavande sānandaḥ puṇyāṃ mandākinīṃ muniḥ // Bhmj_13.1429 //
analyzed: smṛtvā vavande sa ānandaḥ puṇyām mandākinīm muniḥ
āṅgirasīyam
katham prāpyam manuṣyeṇa brāhmaṇyam iti bhūbhujā

original: pṛṣṭo devavrataḥ prāha brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ nṛpa // Bhmj_13.1430 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ devavrataḥ prāha brāhmaṇyam durlabham nṛpa
pituḥ niyogāt yajña artham mataṅga khyaḥ dvijanmanaḥ
vrajan vā aham pratodena kharam gāḍham atāḍayat

original: gardabhī vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā putraṃ duḥkhāduvāca tam /
analyzed: gardabhī vyathitam dṛṣṭvā putram duḥkhāt uvāca tam
brāhmaṇyam nā asya tena eṣa jātaḥ caṇḍāla ceṣṭitaḥ

original: vahainamiti tacchrutvā priyaḥ papraccha tāṃ punaḥ // Bhmj_13.1432 //
analyzed: vaha enam iti tat śrutvā priyaḥ papraccha tām punar

original: tayā niveditāṃ jātiṃ nijāṃ jñātvā sa duḥkhitaḥ /
analyzed: tayā niveditām jātim nijām jñātvā sa duḥkhitaḥ

original: meroḥ śṛṅgādiva śvabhre patito vilalāpa saḥ // Bhmj_13.1433 //
analyzed: meroḥ śṛṅgāt iva śvabhre patitaḥ vilalāpa saḥ

original: pitre nivedya tatpāpaṃ mātuḥ sa tapase vanam /
analyzed: pitre nivedya tat pāpam mātuḥ sa tapase vanam
gatvā brāhmaṇya kāmaḥ bhūt sthāṇu bhūtaḥ śatam samāḥ
śakrāt api svayam prāptāt na eva brāhmaṇyam āptavān

original: tato gatvā gayāṃ cakre sahasrābdaṃ paraṃtapaḥ // Bhmj_13.1435 //
analyzed: tatas gatvā gayām cakre sahasra abdam paraṃtapaḥ
punar punar sa tapasā dhūmāyita jagattrayaḥ

original: indrādavāpa devatvaṃ na tu brāhmaṇyamuttamam // Bhmj_13.1436 //
analyzed: indrāt avāpa deva tvam na tu brāhmaṇyam uttamam

original: chandodeva iti khyātaḥ sa mataṅgābhidhaḥ purā /
analyzed: chandodevaḥ iti khyātaḥ sa mataṅga abhidhaḥ purā
khecaraḥ bhūt mṛgākṣīṇām pūjyaḥ parama vallabhaḥ
indra mātaṅgam
vītahavyasya nṛpateḥ brāhmaṇyam śrūyate kila

original: tadvadeti punaḥ pṛṣṭo rājñā prāha pitāmahaḥ // Bhmj_13.1438 //
analyzed: tadvat eti punar pṛṣṭaḥ rājñā prāha pitāmahaḥ
vītahavya sutaiḥ pūrvam hehayaiḥ balavattaraiḥ

original: haryaśvo nāma samare kāśirājo nipātitaḥ // Bhmj_13.1439 //
analyzed: haryaśvaḥ nāma samare kāśi rājaḥ nipātitaḥ
kālena tasya putraḥ punar taiḥ eva saṃgare
sa devaḥ kāśi nagare labdha lakṣyaiḥ nipātitaḥ
tad sutaḥ pi divodāsaḥ taiḥ eva yudhi nirjitaḥ
bharadvāja prasādāt sa lebhe putram pratardanam
sa vītahavya tanayān sarvān abhyetya saṃgare
jaghāna parama astra jñaḥ bharadvāja varaḥ rjitaḥ
vītahavyaḥ hata sutaḥ pranaṣṭa bala vāhanaḥ
pratardanena anusṛtaḥ prayayau śaraṇam bhṛgum
bhṛgoḥ āśramam āsādya vītahavya vadha udyataḥ

original: pratardano muniṃ prāha muñcainamiti durmadaḥ // Bhmj_13.1444 //
analyzed: pratardanaḥ munim prāha muñca enam iti durmadaḥ

original: tacchrutvā kṣatriyo neha kaścitsarve dvijā vayam /
analyzed: tat śrutvā kṣatriyaḥ na iha kaścid sarve dvijāḥ vayam
iti uvāca bhṛguḥ bhītaḥ tatas satyāt akampata
kṣattra abhidhānāt prabhraṣṭam śatrum jñātvā pratardane
yāte bhṛguḥ vītahavyam satya vāc brāhmaṇam vyadhāt
vītahavya upākhyānam   /

original: ke praṇamyā iti panaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ śāntanavo 'bravīt /
analyzed: ke praṇamyāḥ iti panaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ śāntanavaḥ bravīt
sva karma dharma niratāḥ haṃsāḥ rāga vivarjitāḥ
praṇamyāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ eva pavitra carita vratāḥ

original: yaiṣāṃ kopaprasādābhyāṃ śoṣaḥ poṣaśca bhūbhujām // Bhmj_13.1448 //
analyzed: yā eṣām kopa prasādābhyām śoṣaḥ poṣaḥ ca bhūbhujām
bhūmidevāḥ sadā pūjyāḥ yad prasādāt hutāśanaḥ

original: havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca vahati kṛṣṇamityāha nāradaḥ // Bhmj_13.1449 //
analyzed: havyam kavyam ca vahati kṛṣṇam iti āha nāradaḥ

original: jeya balaṃ bhaye rakṣā bheṣajaṃ vyasanāmaye /
analyzed: jeya balam bhaye rakṣā bheṣajam vyasana āmaye

original: paraloke 'stu vo viprāḥ śakramityāha śambaraḥ // Bhmj_13.1450 //
analyzed: para loke stu vaḥ viprāḥ śakram iti āha śambaraḥ
brāhmaṇa praśaṃsā
strīṇām nisarga lolānām svabhāvam pāṇḍu sūnunā
pṛṣṭaḥ durlakṣya cittānām vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ
strī svabhāvam purā pṛṣṭā nāradena sura aṅganā
jagāda pañcacūla ākhyā yathārtham śāpa kampitā

original: strī satī strīsvabhāvaṃ ca mādṛśī vaktumarhati /
analyzed: strī satī strī svabhāvam ca mādṛśī vaktum arhati

original: śāsanāttava bhītāhaṃ kiṃtu vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ // Bhmj_13.1453 //
analyzed: śāsanāt tava bhītā aham kiṃtu vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ
saṃgharṣa kṣobha kāriṇyaḥ sa udvegāḥ kaluṣa āśayāḥ

original: mattā harantyeva vapurnimnagā iva nimnagāḥ // Bhmj_13.1454 //
analyzed: mattāḥ haranti eva vapuḥ nimna gāḥ iva nimnagāḥ

original: apyanviṣṭā na labhyante saṃtyaktā na tyajanti ca /
analyzed: api anviṣṭāḥ na labhyante saṃtyaktāḥ na tyajanti ca

original: vāsanā iva saṃsāre mohanaikaratāḥ striyaḥ // Bhmj_13.1455 //
analyzed: vāsanāḥ iva saṃsāre mohana eka ratāḥ striyaḥ
prahasanti viṣādinyaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ śocanti helayā

original: rāgiṇyo 'pi priyaṃ ghnanti ko hi tāṃ vetti yoṣitam // Bhmj_13.1456 //
analyzed: rāgiṇyaḥ pi priyam ghnanti kaḥ hi tām vetti yoṣitam

original: na kulena na mānena na dhanena na sevayā /
analyzed: na kulena na mānena na dhanena na sevayā
maryādām anuvartante lalanāḥ capala āśayāḥ

original: suveśaṃ subhagaṃ kāntaṃ tyaktvā paricitaṃ ciram /
analyzed: su veśam subhagam kāntam tyaktvā paricitam ciram
nindyena a dṛṣṭa pūrveṇa ramante sva icchayā striyaḥ
saṃbhāṣitāḥ ced madhuram sa smitam ced vilokitāḥ

original: yantritāḥ svajanenāpi tadā sādhyā na yoṣitaḥ // Bhmj_13.1459 //
analyzed: yantritāḥ sva janena api tadā sādhyāḥ na yoṣitaḥ
arthinām api alābhena duḥkha dainya śrameṇa vā

original: akasmādeva nārīṇāṃ satītvaṃ jāyate kvacit // Bhmj_13.1460 //
analyzed: akasmāt eva nārīṇām satī tvam jāyate kvacid
nānā puruṣa saṃvāsa hāsa ullāsa vilāsinīm
veśyā yoṣām nirīkṣante sa spṛham kula yoṣitaḥ
niṣedhāt eva nārīṇam abhilāṣaḥ vivardhate
para saṅgeṣu apathyeṣu bālānām iva rogiṇām
acchinna prasaraḥ kāmaḥ na eva āsām kṣamate dhṛtim
mithas yāvat pravartante puruṣa asaṃbhave striyaḥ
krūṃrāṇām kṣaṇa rāgāṇām saṃdhyānām iva yoṣitām
satata āsanna doṣāṇām dhīmān kaḥ nāma viśvaset
sarvathā na bhavati eva kāruṇyam iva pāpinām
anutsekaḥ iva āḍhyānām ārjavam hariṇīdṛśām
uparodhaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ api sādhvyaḥ niyantritāḥ
kāntam puruṣam ālokya yānti eva sahasā ārdra tām
sura śaṅkā āspadam abhūt purā vandyaḥ vadhū janaḥ
tatas sura arthitaḥ dhātā kṛtyā sargāt vyadhāt striyaḥ
lajjām labhante lalanāḥ puṃsām kautuka vṛddhaye
patyuḥ viśvāsana upāyam kṛtakam ca satī vratam

original: nṛtyanti śocanti patanti yānti hasanti gāyanti vadanti yacca /
analyzed: nṛtyanti śocanti patanti yānti hasanti gāyanti vadanti yat ca
tat yoṣitaḥ svapna samāna ceṣṭam māyā mayam sarvam asatyam eva
nārada pañcacūḍā saṃvādaḥ

original: tāḥ striyo lolamatayaḥ kathaṃ rakṣyā narairiti /
analyzed: tāḥ striyaḥ lola matayaḥ katham rakṣyāḥ naraiḥ iti
pṛṣṭaḥ yudhiṣṭhireṇa āha punar tripathagā sutaḥ
devaśarmām muniḥ pūrvam yajña artham gantum udyataḥ

original: śaśāsa śiṣyaṃ vipulaṃ bahumāyaṃ śatakratum // Bhmj_13.1471 //
analyzed: śaśāsa śiṣyam vipulam bahu māyam śatakratum

original: jñātvā ruciṃ śarīrāntaḥ praviśa tvaṃ samīravat /
analyzed: jñātvā rucim śarīra antar praviśa tvam samīra vat
gātraiḥ gātrāṇi avaṣṭabhya tasyāḥ tasthau sa yatnavān
atrā antaram samāsādya sahasrākṣaḥ samāyayau

original: sa dadarśa ruciṃ cārulocanāmacalāṃ punaḥ // Bhmj_13.1473 //
analyzed: sa dadarśa rucim cāru locanām acalām punar
hema stana uru jaghanām kāñcanīm iva putrikām
ākhaṇḍalam atha āsādya sā saṃjāta manobhavā
vaktum vipula saṃruddhā na śaśāka su locanā
ākīrṇa hāsa kusumā vilola alaka ṣaṭūpadam
latām iva nivāta sthām sa kampa karapallavām
dṛṣṭvā tām vismitaḥ śakraḥ prāyāt vipula tarjitaḥ

original: abhyetya devaśarmātha sarvaṃ tadbubudhe muniḥ // Bhmj_13.1476 //
analyzed: abhyetya devaśarmā atha sarvam tat bubudhe muniḥ
tasmāt avāpya vipulaḥ tatas tuṣṭāt guroḥ varān

original: cacāra kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṣmāṃ pūjyamāno nṛpairdvijaiḥ // Bhmj_13.1477 //
analyzed: cacāra kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṣmām pūjyamānaḥ nṛpaiḥ dvijaiḥ
atrā antare svasuḥ bhartrā ruciḥ aṅga mahībhujā
nimantritā gṛhe paśyat bhaginīm puṣpa bhūṣitām
visṛṣṭaḥ tad girā śiṣyaḥ puṣpa artham devaśarmaṇā

original: dadarśa mithunaṃ ṣaṭ ca devinaḥ kitavānpathi // Bhmj_13.1479 //
analyzed: dadarśa mithunam ṣaṭ ca devinaḥ kitavān pathi
teṣām vivāde śuśrāva śapatham vipula arjitān
sa lokān āpnuyāt yaḥ ca pracalet saṃvidam iti
tat śrutvā duḥkhitaḥ bhyetya gurave sa nyavedayat
śaṅkamānaḥ guru vadhū gātra saṃsparśa pātakam
guruḥ tam ūce mithunam ahorātram tat ucyate

original: ṛtavaḥ ṣaṭ ca kitavāste nṛṇāṃ karmasākṣiṇaḥ // Bhmj_13.1482 //
analyzed: ṛtavaḥ ṣaṭ ca kitavāḥ te nṛṇām karma sākṣiṇaḥ

original: na śakyā rakṣituṃ nāryo rakṣitā ca tvayā ruciḥ /
analyzed: na śakyāḥ rakṣitum nāryaḥ rakṣitā ca tvayā ruciḥ
asatyena tava udīrṇam tasmāt naśyatu pātakam

original: ityevaṃ rakṣaitā pūrvaṃ vipulena guroḥ priyā /
analyzed: iti evam rakṣā etā pūrvam vipulena guroḥ priyā

original: na tvetā rakṣituṃ śaktaḥ kaścillolavilocanāḥ // Bhmj_13.1484 //
analyzed: na tu etāḥ rakṣitum śaktaḥ kaścid lola vilocanāḥ
vipula upākhyānam
vivāha dharmam pṛṣṭaḥ tha rājñā bhīṣṇaḥ bravīt punar
kanyā guṇavate deyā kulīnāya ati rūpiṇe
śūdrāya iva śrutiḥ kanyā hīnāya pratipāditā
kula dvayam dahati eva tasmāt pātram vicārayet
a śāstra uktaiḥ pariṇayaiḥ jāyate varṇa saṃkaraḥ

original: saṃyogairviṣamaiḥ puṃsāṃ patati vyasane kulam // Bhmj_13.1487 //
analyzed: saṃyogaiḥ viṣamaiḥ puṃsām patati vyasane kulam
vivāha dharmāḥ

original: darśane sahavāse ca satāṃ pṛṣṭo mahībhujā /
analyzed: darśane sahavāse ca satām pṛṣṭaḥ mahībhujā

original: māhātmyaṃ ca gavāṃ bīṣmaḥ sarvajñaḥ punarabravīt // Bhmj_13.1488 //
analyzed: māhātmyam ca gavām bīṣmaḥ sarva jñaḥ punar abravīt
gaṅgā yamunayoḥ madhye cyavanaḥ ntar jala vrataḥ

original: tasthau munīndraḥ suciraṃ sthāṇubhūto mahātapāḥ // Bhmj_13.1489 //
analyzed: tasthau muni indraḥ su ciram sthāṇu bhūtaḥ mahā tapāḥ
āghrāya puṇyam āmodam tasya kāruṇya śālinaḥ
ālīya tasthuḥ gātreṣu matsyāḥ valaya līlayā
tatas kālena mahatā jālena ākṛṣya dhīvarāḥ
vipulam matsya saṃghātam tad madhye dadṛśuḥ munim
śaivāla nāla valitam śaṅkhi kaṅkaṇa mālitam
hari śmaśru jaṭā piṅgam tejasām iva saṃcayam

original: taṃ vīkṣya kampitāḥ sarve sahasā jālajīvinaḥ /
analyzed: tam vīkṣya kampitāḥ sarve sahasā jāla jīvinaḥ
nimīlita akṣam jagaduḥ prasīda bhagavan iti
tatas sa karumā āviṣṭaḥ matsyeṣu sahavāsiṣu
niṣādān avadat paśyan dṛśā anugraha vāñchayā
vikrīya mām vimucyantām yuṣmābhiḥ salila okasaḥ

original: dayitāḥ sahavāsānme matsyā yūyaṃ ca darśanāt // Bhmj_13.1495 //
analyzed: dayitāḥ sahavāsāt me matsyāḥ yūyam ca darśanāt
iti ukte muninā dāśāḥ tūrṇam gatvā mahībhuje
vepamānāḥ sva vṛttāntam nahuṣāya nyavedayan

original: tataḥ svayaṃ sa nṛpatiḥ pūjāmādāya satvaraḥ /
analyzed: tatas svayam sa nṛpatiḥ pūjām ādāya sa tvaraḥ
purohitam puraskṛtya cyavanam draṣṭum āyayau
kṛta praṇāmam nahuṣam muniḥ vīkṣya kṛta añjalim
yathā ucitena mūlyena mām gṛhāṇa iti acodayat
dhīvarebhyaḥ sahasrāṇi koṭi koṭi śatāni ca
rājya ardham athavā rājyam dadāni iti abravīt nṛpaḥ
na etat mama ucitam mūlyam cintyatām munibhiḥ saha
nṛpam dāśeṣu kāruṇyāt iti uvāca asakṛt muniḥ
tatas viṣaṇṇam nahuṣam śāpa bhītam adhomukham

original: gavi jāto dvijavaro babhāṣe dhīmatāṃ varaḥ // Bhmj_13.1501 //
analyzed: gavi jātaḥ dvijavaraḥ babhāṣe dhīmatām varaḥ
mūlyam muni īśvarasya asya tulyam gauḥ eva yat param

original: tasmādenaṃ gavā rājangṛhāṇa bhava nirvṛtaḥ // Bhmj_13.1502 //
analyzed: tasmāt enam gavā rājan gṛhāṇa bhava nirvṛtaḥ
brāhmaṇena iti abhihite prahṛṣṭaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: muktaye matsyasaṃghānāṃ gavā jagrāha bhārgavam // Bhmj_13.1503 //
analyzed: muktaye matsya saṃghānām gavā jagrāha bhārgavam
tatas darśana vātsalyāt cyavanaḥ karuṇā nidhiḥ

original: dāśebhyaḥ pratijagrāha dhenuṃ tatkuśale sthitaḥ // Bhmj_13.1504 //
analyzed: dāśebhyaḥ pratijagrāha dhenum tad kuśale sthitaḥ
muni indreṇa gṛhītāyām vidhivat gavi dhīvarāḥ
tad dṛṣṭi pātāt matsyāḥ ca sa śarīrāḥ divam gatāḥ
amṛta āyatanam gāvaḥ pavitrāḥ rudra mātaraḥ

original: smṛtimātreṇa muṣṇanti kilbiṣaṃ kila dehinām // Bhmj_13.1506 //
analyzed: smṛti mātreṇa muṣṇanti kilbiṣam kila dehinām
cyavana upākhyānam
kuśikasya kṣitipateḥ jātaḥ vipraḥ katham kule
bhṛgoḥ nṛpaḥ ca iti rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ vādīt suravrataḥ purā
bhāvi kathā abhijñaḥ cyavanaḥ tejasām nidhiḥ
mandire pūjitaḥ tasthau kuśikasya mahīpateḥ
sa bhūbhujā sa bhāryeṇa paricaryā vrate dhṛte

original: bhuktvā suṣvāpa niśceṣṭaḥ saptarātratrayaṃ muniḥ // Bhmj_13.1509 //
analyzed: bhuktvā suṣvāpa niśceṣṭaḥ saptarātra trayam muniḥ
pāda saṃvāhanam tasya nirāhāraḥ vadhū sakhaḥ
rājā cakāra nibhṛtaḥ nidrā bhaṅga bhaya ākulaḥ

original: tato muniḥ samutthāya maunī gatvā manojavaḥ /
analyzed: tatas muniḥ samutthāya maunī gatvā manojavaḥ
antardadhe sa bhāryeṇa nṛpeṇa anusṛtaḥ pathi
tasmin antarhite rājā nirāhāraḥ ti mūrcchitaḥ

original: patitaḥ kṣaṇamāśvāsya viveśa svagṛhaṃ punaḥ // Bhmj_13.1512 //
analyzed: patitaḥ kṣaṇam āśvāsya viveśa sva gṛham punar
tau dampatī dadṛśatuḥ mūkam kāṣṭham iva acalam
eka pārśvena suptasya kṣapāḥ tasya ekaviṃśatim
tasthatuḥ tau nirāhārau pāda saṃvāhane punar
pratibuddhaḥ tha tailena śata pātena bhubhujā

original: bhaktyā nirvartitasnāno bheje siṃhāsanaṃ muniḥ // Bhmj_13.1514 //
analyzed: bhaktyā nirvartita snānaḥ bheje siṃhāsanam muniḥ

original: tato nānāvidhaṃ bhojyaṃ rājayogyaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: tatas nānāvidham bhojyam rāja yogyam svayam kṛtam

original: dattaṃ rājñā sabhāryeṇa dadāha bhṛgunandanaḥ // Bhmj_13.1515 //
analyzed: dattam rājñā sa bhāryeṇa dadāha bhṛgunandanaḥ
punar antarhitaḥ bhūtvā punar kṛtvā asya saṃnidhim

original: nirvikāraṃ sabhāryaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvābhūdvismito muniḥ // Bhmj_13.1516 //
analyzed: nirvikāram sa bhāryam tam dṛṣṭvā abhūt vismitaḥ muniḥ
avikriyam nirāhāram sa rājānam vadhū sakham
rathena sāṃyugīnena vaha mām iti acodayat

original: ityuktvā dampatī dhṛtvā tau rathe vicacāra saḥ /
analyzed: iti uktvā dampatī dhṛtvā tau rathe vicacāra saḥ
tri kaṇṭhaka kaṣā āghāta saṃjāta kṛta ja ukṣitau
adarśayat tatas citra hema vallī manoharam
svargam sa nandana udyānam muniḥ tau mohayan muhur
dṛṣṭa naṣṭaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ māyā caṭula vibhramaiḥ

original: muninā vihitairmohaṃ dampatī tau na jagmatuḥ // Bhmj_13.1520 //
analyzed: muninā vihitaiḥ moham dampatī tau na jagmatuḥ
vepamānau nirāhārau dūra adhva śrama karṣitau
tuṣṭaḥ cirān a muni varaḥ rathāt muktvā jagāda tau
prītaḥ ham yuvayoḥ bhaktyā gṛhṇītam adhunā varam
pautraḥ te brāhmaṇaḥ rājan bhaviṣyati mahā tapāḥ
tad vaṃśa jaiḥ virodhaḥ yam bhārgavānām upasthitaḥ
tasmāt kṣatriya viccheda dhiyā tvam pīḍitaḥ mayā
gata klamaḥ nivṛttaḥ ca pīyūṣaiḥ iva pūritaḥ

original: bhava madvacasā dhanyaḥ sabhāryaḥ pṛthivīpate // Bhmj_13.1524 //
analyzed: bhava mad vacasā dhanyaḥ sa bhāryaḥ pṛthivīpate
iti uktvā antarhite tasmin tasya kālena bhūpateḥ
ajāyata kule śrīmān vinaśvāmitraḥ tapaḥ nidhiḥ
bhārgavaḥ ca yathā jātaḥ rāmaḥ kṣatra kṣayaḥ ūrjitaḥ

original: ṛcīkasya prabhāveṇa tanmayā kathitaṃ purā // Bhmj_13.1526 //
analyzed: ṛcīkasya prabhāveṇa tat mayā kathitam purā
cyavana kuśika saṃvādaḥ
śrutvā etat bhūbhujā pṛthvī kṣaya pātaka śaṅkinā
punar pṛṣṭaḥ vadat bhīṣṇaḥ dānānām phalam uttamam
tapasā labhyate sarvam ācāreṇa damena ca

original: ānṛśaṃsyena satyena dānena ca samīhitam // Bhmj_13.1528 //
analyzed: ānṛśaṃsyena satyena dānena ca samīhitam
dattvā vibhūṣitām dhenum kapilām kāṃsya dohanīm
pṛthivī dāna sadṛśam phalam prāpnoti mānavaḥ
prayāti vasu lokam ca tiladhenu pradaḥ naraḥ
kanyā bhūmi pradaḥ śakra lokam āsādya modate
bhūta abhaya pradānam tu dānānām pravaram smṛtam
nija abhimata dānam ca sarva kāma phala pradam

original: suvarṇadānena nṛṇāṃ kṣīyate kila pātakam // Bhmj_13.1531 //
analyzed: suvarṇa dānena nṛṇām kṣīyate kila pātakam

original: sarvaṃ sūte vasumatī dhatte ca nikhilaṃ jagat /
analyzed: sarvam sūte vasumatī dhatte ca nikhilam jagat
jñeyaḥ sarva pradaḥ tasmāt dātṝṇām bhūmi daḥ varaḥ
annam śarīriṇām prāṇāḥ tasmāt prāṇa pradaḥ nna daḥ

original: annadānasamaṃ loke nāstīti prāha nāradaḥ // Bhmj_13.1533 //
analyzed: anna dāna samam loke na asti iti prāha nāradaḥ
pānīya dānam amṛtam prāṇinām saṃpracakṣate
vicchāya tāpa jvalitāḥ para loke hi bhūmayaḥ
tila pradānam śaṃsanti kṣayāya nikhila enasām

original: tuṣṭo yamaḥ purā vipraṃ tilāndehītyacodayat // Bhmj_13.1535 //
analyzed: tuṣṭaḥ yamaḥ purā vipram tilān dehi iti acodayat
brahma sva varjam sarva svam dattvā durgāṇi saṃtaret

original: brahmasvaśalyaṃ hi nṛṇāṃ tīvrapātaṃ pracakṣate // Bhmj_13.1536 //
analyzed: brahma sva śalyam hi nṛṇām tīvra pātam pracakṣate
dvāravatyām mahā kūpe purā gulma tṛṇa āvṛte
kṛkalāsam mahā kāyam dadṛśuḥ sarva vṛṣṇayaḥ
sa taiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ samuddhartum aśaktaiḥ avadat śanais
nṛgaḥ ham nṛpatiḥ brahma śāpāt yātaḥ daśām imām
viprebhyaḥ gṛhamedhibhyaḥ nikharvāṇi purā gavām

original: hemakoṭiprado dattvā yāto 'haṃ nirvṛtiṃ parām // Bhmj_13.1539 //
analyzed: hema koṭi pradaḥ dattvā yātaḥ ham nirvṛtim parām
tatas kadācid mad datta dhenum viprasya mandire

original: nijāṃ caurahṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā jagrāha brāhmaṇo 'paraḥ // Bhmj_13.1540 //
analyzed: nijām caura hṛtām dṛṣṭvā jagrāha paraḥ

original: rājñā mameyaṃ prāgdattā hṛteyaṃ dasyunā paraḥ /
analyzed: rājñā mama iyam prāk dattā hṛtā iyam dasyunā paraḥ
evam vivadamānau tau mad sabhām abhijagmatuḥ
tad vṛttāntam aham śrutvā prārthanā bahuśas tayoḥ
dhanaiḥ gobhiḥ naraiḥ aśvaiḥ yatnāt akaravam pṛthak
tathā api ekaḥ na tatyāja gām pratigraha pālanāt

original: dvitīyaśca gṛhe jātāṃ tāṃ snehabhayakātaraḥ // Bhmj_13.1543 //
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ ca gṛhe jātām tām sneha bhaya kātaraḥ
atha kālena yātaḥ ham dharmarāja niketanam
bahu dāna arjitān lokān divyān aśrauṣam ātmanaḥ
kiṃtu brahma sva vibhraṃśāt mama imām kṛkalāsa tām
śauri darśana paryantām ādideśa svayam yamaḥ
iti bruvāṇaḥ kṛṣṇasya daśā vidhvasta pātakaḥ

original: nṛgo jagāma tridivaṃ tyaktvā tāṃ kṛkalāsatām // Bhmj_13.1546 //
analyzed: nṛgaḥ jagāma tridivam tyaktvā tām kṛkalāsa tām
nṛga upākhyānam
uddālakasya brahmarṣeḥ pituḥ kopāt mahā muniḥ
nāsiketa abhidhaḥ prāṇān tatyāja abhihataḥ dṛśā

original: putraṃ nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śāntakrodho muniḥ śanaiḥ /
analyzed: putram nipatitam dṛṣṭvā śānta krodhaḥ muniḥ śanais
ajīvayat mantra nidhiḥ kāruṇyāt sa aśru locanaḥ

original: tataḥ svapnotthita iva prāptajīvo muneḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: tatas svapna utthitaḥ iva prāpta jīvaḥ muneḥ sutaḥ
pitrā pṛṣṭaḥ vadat sarvam dṛṣṭam yat yama mandire
ratna stambha śata udāre pitṛrāja sabhā tale

original: avāpaṃ vipulāṃ pūjāṃ pādyamardhyaṃ tathāsanam // Bhmj_13.1550 //
analyzed: avāpam vipulām pūjām pādyam ardhyam tathā āsanam
tatra apaśyam vimāneṣu sūrya indu dyuti kāntiṣu
bhāsvara ābharaṇa smerān narān sukṛta śālinaḥ
ghṛta kṣīra amṛta jalāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ tatra mayā āpagāḥ
hema abja puñja kuñja agra kūjat maṇi vihaṅgamāḥ
divyān bhogān mayā dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭaḥ vaivasvataḥ smayāt
etāḥ pīyūṣa vāhinyaḥ keṣām sva icchā parigrahāḥ
yamaḥ bravīt go pradānām etāḥ kṣīra ghṛta āpagāḥ
na a dattvā puruṣaḥ dhenum parama amṛtam aśnute
asaṃbhave gavām yāvat salilena tilena ca

original: ghṛtena vā kalpayitvā dhenuṃ dadyātsudhāśayā // Bhmj_13.1555 //
analyzed: ghṛtena vā kalpayitvā dhenum dadyāt sudhā āśayā
go dāna sadṛśam loke dānam anyat na vidyate

original: sādaraṃ māṃ putṛpatirjagādeti punaḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_13.1556 //
analyzed: sa ādaram mām putṛpatiḥ jagāda iti punar punar
iti ukte nāsiketena muniḥ muni śataiḥ vṛtaḥ
go pradānam mahat puṇyam praśaśaṃsa muhur muhur
nāsiketa upākhyānam  /
sarva lokān atikramya gavām lokaḥ prakaśate
yat satyam nirayāyante tatra svarga sukha śriyaḥ
go pradāḥ eva golokam prāyanti sukṛta ujjvalāḥ

original: ityuvāca purā pṛṣṭaḥ śakreṇa kamalāsanaḥ // Bhmj_13.1559 //
analyzed: iti uvāca purā pṛṣṭaḥ śakreṇa kamalāsanaḥ
vasiṣṭha adya muni varāḥ nṛpāḥ daśaratha ādayaḥ

original: surāśca śakrapramukhā gotulyaṃ na pracakṣate // Bhmj_13.1560 //
analyzed: surāḥ ca śakra pramukhāḥ go tulyam na pracakṣate

original: nivāsārthaṃ purā gāvaḥ prārthitā bahuśaḥ śriyā /
analyzed: nivāsa artham purā gāvaḥ prārthitāḥ bahuśas śriyā
nigadya capalā asi iti pradaduḥ na pratiśrayam
abhāṣata tatas lakṣmīḥ bhavatībhiḥ anādarāt

original: tyaktā nindyā bhaviṣyāmi tasmādyāce punaḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_13.1562 //
analyzed: tyaktā nindyā bhaviṣyāmi tasmāt yāce punar punar
athā ādiṣṭā śriyaḥ gobhiḥ helayā gomaye sthitiḥ

original: tasmādetāḥ paraṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ nāstyataḥ param // Bhmj_13.1563 //
analyzed: tasmāt etāḥ param puṇyam pavitram na asti atas param
go pradānam
hema dānam dahati evam sarva pāpāni dehinām

original: tejo hi paramaṃ putra kāñcanaṃ jātavedasaḥ // Bhmj_13.1564 //
analyzed: tejaḥ hi paramam putra kāñcanam jātavedasaḥ
purā aham jāhnavī kūle śrāddhe piṇḍa prada pituḥ
apaśyam śantanoḥ pāṇim utthitam ratna kaṅkaṇam

original: piṇḍo mayā kuśeṣveva taṃ vilokya samarpitaḥ /
analyzed: piṇḍaḥ mayā kuśeṣu eva tam vilokya samarpitaḥ

original: tuṣṭastadā me janakaṃ svapne provāca māmidam // Bhmj_13.1566 //
analyzed: tuṣṭaḥ tadā me janakam svapne provāca mām idam
śāstra anuvartinā putra tvayā dhanyaḥ smi sūnunā

original: kanakaṃ dehi viprebhyo dānānāmuttamaṃ hi tat // Bhmj_13.1567 //
analyzed: kanakam dehi viprebhyaḥ dānānām uttamam hi tat

original: jāmadagnyaḥ purā rāmaḥ kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyaṃ jagat /
analyzed: jāmadagnyaḥ purā rāmaḥ kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyam jagat
munibhiḥ dāpitaḥ hema tasmāt pāpāt amucyata
tāra koṣa plutāḥ devāḥ purā śītāṃśu śekharam
skanda utpattim ayācanta kathām vijñāya bhāvinīm
tatas gaurīpati vīryam vadane jātavedasaḥ
rati vighna kṛtaḥ devaḥ tatyāja paramam mahaḥ
vahninā atha dhṛtaḥ garbhaḥ śrīmān saṃvatsara ayutam

original: gaṅgāyāṃ nihitaḥ sāpi nidadhe taṃ girestaṭe // Bhmj_13.1571 //
analyzed: gaṅgāyām nihitaḥ sā api nidadhe tam gireḥ taṭe
sa kārtikeyaḥ bhagavān jātaḥ śara vane śiśuḥ
surāṇām śaktimān āsīt senānīḥ tārakāntakaḥ
tasya janmani yat pūrvam saṃjātam jātavedasaḥ

original: mahī vasumatī yena tatsuvarṇaṃ pracakṣate // Bhmj_13.1573 //
analyzed: mahī vasumatī yena tat suvarṇam pracakṣate
atha śrāddha vidhim pṛṣṭaḥ rājñā śāntanavaḥ bravīt
tila pradānam vijñeyam śrāddham madhu ghṛta āplutam
māṣa matsya aiḍa śaśaka chāga vārāha śākunaiḥ
pārṣata nyaṅgu gavaya māhiṣaiḥ vai navaiḥ api
māṃsaiḥ vivṛddhyā māsānām kramāt saṃvatsaram sadā

original: tṛptiṃ pitṝṇāṃ śrāddheṣu vadanti śrutikovidāḥ // Bhmj_13.1576 //
analyzed: tṛptim pitṝṇām śrāddheṣu vadanti śruti kovidāḥ
vāghrīṇasasya māṃsena dvādaśa abdam uśanti ca
khaṅga māṃsaiḥ lohapṛṣṭhaiḥ kālaśākaiḥ tathā kṣayam

original: na teṣāṃ pitaraḥ śocyāstrayodaśyāṃ madhāsu ca /
analyzed: na teṣām pitaraḥ śocyāḥ trayodaśyām madhāsu ca

original: varṣāsu vihitaṃ śrāddhaṃ pāyase na sasarpiṣā // Bhmj_13.1578 //
analyzed: varṣāsu vihitam śrāddham pāyase na sa sarpiṣā
gāyakūpe vaṭa tale chāyāyām kuñjarasya vā

original: anantaṃ kalayantyeva śrāddhaṃ puṇyadineṣu ca // Bhmj_13.1579 //
analyzed: anantam kalayanti eva śrāddham puṇya dineṣu ca
vidhi nakṣatra yogeṣu kāmyam śrāddham vinirdiśet
śrāddham vipraḥ
vaiśvadevena vidhinā ca vahninā
rakṣyate brāhmaṇaiḥ śrāddham viṣṇu pūjā puraḥsaraiḥ
śrāddhe niṣiddham satatam sa guḍam lavaṇatrayam
ajājī hiṅgu sauvīra palāṇḍu laśunāni ca
dātṛ pratigrahītṝṇām viśeṣam jagatībhujā
pṛṣṭaḥ surasarit sūnuḥ dhyātvā punar abhāṣata
anāvṛṣṭi hate kāle purā nirdagdha pādape
arundhatī sakhāḥ ceruḥ śāntāḥ saptarṣayaḥ kṣitau

original: dāsaḥ paśusakho nāma dāsī caṇḍā ca tadvadhūḥ /
analyzed: dāsaḥ paśusakhaḥ nāma dāsī caṇḍā ca tad vadhūḥ
tān eva anuprayayatuḥ kṣudh tṛṣṇā paripīḍitau

original: rājye surājñaḥ śaibyasya gatāsuṃ tanayaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: rājye su rājñaḥ śaibyasya gatāsum tanayam tatas

original: munayaste kṣudhākrāntāḥ sthālyāṃ paktuṃ samudyayuḥ // Bhmj_13.1586 //
analyzed: munayaḥ te kṣudhā ākrāntāḥ sthālyām paktum samudyayuḥ
atha rājā vṛṣādarbhiḥ dṛṣṭvā vaiśravaṇa upamaḥ
vyagrān munīn viṣaṇṇa ātmā tān uvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: yathecchaṃ gṛhyatāṃ mattaḥ sarvaṃ vā vividhaṃ vasu /
analyzed: yatheccham gṛhyatām mattaḥ sarvam vā vividham vasu
jugupsā jananī vṛttiḥ bhavadbhiḥ tyajyatām iyam
iti ukte bhūmipālena pratyūcuḥ muni puṃgavāḥ
tapaḥ kṣaya karaḥ rājan ghoraḥ rāja pratigrahaḥ
pratigraha a gnigdhānām sakṛt brāhmaṇa śākhinām
kilbiṣa ajñāna śeṣāṇām punar puṇya phalam kutas

original: etaduktvā parityajya stālīṃ te kānanaṃ yayuḥ /
analyzed: etat uktvā parityajya stālīm te kānanam yayuḥ
prāṇa pīḍā paṇena api pratigraha parāṅbhukhāḥ
vane teṣām vṛṣādarbhiḥ phalāni audumbarāṇi atha
mantribhiḥ hema garbhāṇi kārayitvā akṣipat puras
tāni api jvalitāni eva bhītāḥ tyaktvā muni īśvarāḥ
yayuḥ mithas praśaṃsantaḥ puṇya saṃtoṣa śīla tām
tad prakopāt vṛṣādarbhiḥ hutvā sapadi pāvakam
kṛtyām utpādya bhaya dām ādideśa muni kṣaye
atrā antare te munayaḥ carantaḥ kānane
dadṛśuḥ pīvara ākāram parivrājam śunaḥsakham
vilokya tam arundhatyā pṛṣṭāḥ tad puṣṭi kāraṇam

original: ūcurmunivarā nāyaṃ kriyāvyagro yathā vayam // Bhmj_13.1596 //
analyzed: ūcuḥ muni varāḥ na ayam kriyā vyagraḥ yathā vayam

original: agnihotraṃ na vedāśca śāstrakanthā na duḥsahā /
analyzed: agnihotram na vedāḥ ca śāstra kanthā na duḥsahā

original: nānendhanaprayatnaśca na kalatraṃ na yācakāḥ // Bhmj_13.1597 //
analyzed: nānā indhana prayatnaḥ ca na kalatram na yācakāḥ
śunaḥsakhasya svacchanda cāriṇaḥ sukha śālinaḥ
śarīram pīvaram idam cintā śūnyasya vardhate
iti uktvā tena saṃjāta sauhārdāḥ munayaḥ vane
dadṛśuḥ nalinīm phulla kamala utpala śālinīm
vṛṣādarbhi prayuktā sā
tatra tān avadat horā rakṣāmi nalinīm imām
nivedya nija nāmāni gṛhyantām tu mṛṇālikāḥ
ajñāta nāmadheyānām nā iha mad saṃnidhau gatiḥ
etat atri prabhṛtayaḥ śrutvā te munayaḥ kramāt
gūḍha nirvacanaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ nāmāni asyai nyavedayan
tulya akṣara pada kṣobham nāma teṣām niruktataḥ
śrutvā niṣpratibhā
sa rakṣyām avārayat

original: śunaḥsakhoditaṃ nāma punaḥ papraccha sā yadā /
analyzed: śunaḥsakha uditam nāma punar papraccha sā yadā

original: tadā kruddhāstu daṇḍena vidadhustāṃ ca bhasmasāt // Bhmj_13.1604 //
analyzed: tadā kruddhāḥ tu daṇḍena vidadhuḥ tām ca bhasmasāt
tatas śaśi kara ākārāḥ samuddhṛtya mṛṇālikāḥ

original: tīre nikṣipya munayaḥ snātvā cakrurjalakriyām // Bhmj_13.1605 //
analyzed: tīre nikṣipya munayaḥ snātvā cakruḥ jalakriyām
athā utthāya visāhāra sādarāḥ te śrama ākulāḥ
visāni tāni nā apaśyat nyastāni nalinī taṭe
parasparam śaṅkitāḥ ca cakrire śapatham kramāt
sahasā abhimata ucchedaḥ mahatām api duḥsahaḥ
vṛthā pākaḥ vṛthā ācāraḥ kūṭa sākṣī niṣiddha kṛt
dṛśaṃsaḥ kāma caritaḥ cauraḥ veda vivarjitaḥ
padā spṛśatu gām vahnim apsu śleṣmā abhiyacchatu
para dāra abhigāmī ca gara daḥ soma vikrayī

original: piśunaścāstvasau yena hṛtaṃ no visabhojanam // Bhmj_13.1609 //
analyzed: piśunaḥ ca astu asau yena hṛtam naḥ visabhojanam
iti ukte munibhiḥ paścāt tān uvāca śunaḥsakhaḥ

original: yājine chandasāṃ dhāmne śuddhāya brahmacāriṇe // Bhmj_13.1610 //
analyzed: yājine chandasām dhāmne śuddhāya brahmacāriṇe

original: deyātsa kanyakāṃ yena hatānyatra bhi(vi)sāni naḥ /
analyzed: deyāt sa kanyakām yena hatāni atra naḥ
śrutvā etat ūcuḥ munayaḥ tvayā bhāṣitam īpsitam
tvayā eva hṛtam asmākam
sa bhojanam

original: iti teṣu bruvāṇeṣu hasanprāha śunaḥsakhaḥ // Bhmj_13.1612 //
analyzed: iti teṣu bruvāṇeṣu hasan prāha śunaḥsakhaḥ
mayā evā iha visa stainyam kṛtam vaḥ hita kāriṇā

original: sā ca kṛtyā hatā ghoro devo 'haṃ tridaśeśvaraḥ // Bhmj_13.1613 //
analyzed: sā ca kṛtyā hatā ghoraḥ devaḥ ham tridaśeśvaraḥ
iti uktvā nijam āsthāya rūpam saptarṣibhiḥ saha
vellat vimāna mālā aṅkam nākam nākapatiḥ yayau
pratigraha nivṛttānām evam ujjvala cetasām
vibhāti a laulya ābharaṇā vṛttiḥ saṃtoṣa śālinām
visastainyam
munayaḥ kaśyapa mukhāḥ nṛpāḥ ca nahuṣa ādayaḥ

original: śatakratuṃ puraskṛtya tīrthāni prayayuḥ purā // Bhmj_13.1616 //
analyzed: śatakratum puraskṛtya tīrthāni prayayuḥ purā
te snātvā puṇya tīrtheṣu puṣkarāhariṇīm yayuḥ
tatra agastya muniḥ nyastam na apaśyat nija puṣkaram
tatas te śapatham cakruḥ krameṇa guru pātakam

original: indrastu prāha dhanyo 'stu sa hṛtaṃ yena puṣkaram // Bhmj_13.1618 //
analyzed: indraḥ tu prāha dhanyaḥ stu sa hṛtam yena puṣkaram
puṣkara stainyam
chattra upānah pradhā dā
ca bhīṣmaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ mahībhujā

original: uvāceha paraṃ puṇyaṃ paratra trāṇamiṣyate // Bhmj_13.1619 //
analyzed: uvāca iha param puṇyam paratra trāṇam iṣyate
jamadagniḥ purā dhanvī lakṣya abhyāsa rataḥ vane
sasarja sāyaka śreṇīm raśmi mālām iva aṃśumān
visṛṣṭān viśikhān bhartrā reṇukā tatra tad girā
ānināya indu vadanā sukumārā punar punar
tām caṇḍakiraṇa sphāra saṃtāpa āyāsa mūrcchitām

original: sa jāyāṃ vīkṣya madhyāhne kruddhaḥ sūryamudaikṣata // Bhmj_13.1622 //
analyzed: sa jāyām vīkṣya madhyāhne kruddhaḥ sūryam udaikṣata
tatas divya astra vikaṭam khe prahartum samudyatam
raviḥ prasādayāmāsa bhayāt etya kṛtāñjaliḥ
gata krodhasya tasya atha chattram ātapa vāraṇam

original: upānahau ca pradadau prītaye vāsareśvaraḥ // Bhmj_13.1624 //
analyzed: upānahau ca pradadau prītaye vāsareśvaraḥ
chattra upānah pradhā dā
tat dānānām uttamam smṛtam
saṃtāpa śamanam nṝṇām asmin loke paratra ca
chattra utpattiḥ
taḍāka kūpa dānam ca puṇyam śarma śarīriṇām

original: paratra marusaṃtapte pānīyaṃ kila durlabham // Bhmj_13.1626 //
analyzed: paratra maru saṃtapte pānīyam kila durlabham
apāra timire ghore para loke nirāśraye
āloka durlabhaḥ tasmāt dīpam dadyāt naraḥ sadā
prīṇāti sakalān lokān sumanaḥ vali dhūpa daḥ

original: asurendramiti prāha purā śukraḥ kathāntare // Bhmj_13.1628 //
analyzed: asura indram iti prāha purā śukraḥ kathā antare
puṣpa dhūpa pradaḥ svarge durdharṣaḥ nahuṣaḥ bhavat
ākhaṇḍalasya āsanam ca prāpa akhaṇḍita śāsanaḥ
yadā pasparśa pādena sarpa iti muni puṃgavam
dṛptaḥ gastyam samāviśya bhṛguṇā pātitaḥ tadā
bhīma bāhu graha kṛtaḥ ghora ajagara rūpiṇaḥ

original: araṇye bhavatā yasya śāpamokṣaḥ purā kṛtaḥ // Bhmj_13.1631 //
analyzed: araṇye bhavatā yasya śāpa mokṣaḥ purā kṛtaḥ
puṣpa ādi dānam
punar pṛṣṭaḥ nṛpatinā gatim brahma sva hāriṇām

original: ūce śāntanavo rājanbrahmasvaṃ viṣamaṃ viṣam // Bhmj_13.1632 //
analyzed: ūce śāntanavaḥ rājan brahma svam viṣamam viṣam
jātismaraḥ purā kaścid rāja putraḥ sa kautukaḥ
ku jāti hetum paprāccha caṇḍālam saḥ u pi abhāṣata
śrūyatām kāraṇam yena prāptaḥ caṇḍāla tām aham

original: brāhmaṇasya purā gāvo hṛtāḥ prabaladasyubhiḥ // Bhmj_13.1634 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya purā gāvaḥ hṛtāḥ prabala dasyubhiḥ
tāsām rajaḥ yajña bhūmau soma madhye patat kvacid

original: tatpītvā narakaṃ viprā dīkṣitena sahāyayuḥ // Bhmj_13.1635 //
analyzed: tat pītvā narakam viprāḥ dīkṣitena saha āyayuḥ
bhikṣā pātre nipatitam tat reṇu brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: tadreṇu tatsthitaṃ cānnaṃ mohānme bhakṣyatāṃ yayau // Bhmj_13.1636 //
analyzed: tat reṇu tat sthitam ca annam mohāt me bhakṣya tām yayau
brāhmaṇaḥ śrotriyaḥ ca aham brahmacārī jita indriyaḥ
tena avastām imām prāptaḥ paśya brahma sva gauravam
iti uktvā kṣatriya girā brāhmaṇa arthe raṇa anale

original: hutvā śarīraṃ caṇḍālaḥ prāpa puṇyaṃ punargatim // Bhmj_13.1638 //
analyzed: hutvā śarīram caṇḍālaḥ prāpa puṇyam punar gatim
rājanya caṇḍāla saṃvādaḥ

original: nānā gatīḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ bhīṣmaḥ pṛṣṭo mahībhujā /
analyzed: nānā gatīḥ puṇya kṛtām bhīṣmaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ mahībhujā

original: uvāca karmavaicitryātte te lokāḥ śarīriṇām // Bhmj_13.1639 //
analyzed: uvāca karma vaicitryāt te te lokāḥ śarīriṇām
gautamena āśrame pūrvam śiśuḥ hastī vivardhitaḥ
homa avaśeṣa payasā nīvāra prasavena ca
tatas mada jala śyāma kapola ālīna ṣaṭpadaḥ
līlā alasaḥ sa kālena babhūva acala saṃnibhaḥ

original: muneḥ putra iva prītyā sa babhūva mahāgajaḥ // Bhmj_13.1642 //
analyzed: muneḥ putraḥ iva prītyā sa babhūva mahā gajaḥ

original: taṃ pravṛddhaṃ tathā nāgaṃ svayametya śatakratuḥ /
analyzed: tam pravṛddham tathā nāgam svayam etya śatakratuḥ
jahāra rūpam āsthāya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya bhūpateḥ

original: punaḥ punaryācyamāno muninā sa yadā nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: punar punar yācyamānaḥ muninā sa yadā nṛpaḥ

original: na tatyāja gajaṃ darpāttadā taṃ gautamo 'vadat // Bhmj_13.1644 //
analyzed: na tatyāja gajam darpāt tadā tam gautamaḥ vadat
gatvā yatra śarīra ante narāḥ kāla vaśīkṛtāḥ

original: nandanti śocantyathavā tatra dāsyasi me gajam // Bhmj_13.1645 //
analyzed: nandanti śocanti athavā tatra dāsyasi me gajam
pāpa ātmānaḥ viśasyante yatra taiḥ bhrakuṭī mukhaiḥ
vaivasvata samādiṣṭaiḥ tatra dāsyasi me gajam
samānāḥ bhīravaḥ śūrāḥ durbalāḥ balinaḥ tathā

original: yatra mugdhā vidagdhāśca tatra dāsyati me gajam // Bhmj_13.1647 //
analyzed: yatra mugdhāḥ vidagdhāḥ ca tatra dāsyati me gajam

original: dhanadasya pure ramye merau vā nandane vane /
analyzed: dhanadasya pure ramye merau vā nandane vane
dhāmni śīta mayūkhasya sahasra kiraṇasya vā
varuṇa asya sura indrasya surabhīṇām svayaṃbhuvaḥ

original: loke vā dāsyasi gajaṃ na tatra balavānasi // Bhmj_13.1649 //
analyzed: loke vā dāsyasi gajam na tatra balavān asi
etat śrutvā avadat rājā narakam yānti nāstikāḥ
narāḥ vyāmiśra karmāṇaḥ prayānti yama mandiram
dhanadasya puram yānti tithi pūjakāḥ

original: yaṣṭāro nandanaṃ yānti dātāraḥ somamaṇḍalam // Bhmj_13.1651 //
analyzed: yaṣṭāraḥ nandanam yānti dātāraḥ soma maṇḍalam
kha adhyāyinaḥ sūrya lokam niyatāḥ tīrtha sevinaḥ
yānti praśāntāḥ saṃsārāt param dhāma svayaṃbhuvaḥ

original: nāhaṃ kvacidgamiṣyāmi kva nu dāsyāmi te gajam // Bhmj_13.1652 //
analyzed: na aham kvacid gamiṣyāmi kva nu dāsyāmi te gajam

original: ityuktvā kuñjaraṃ tasmai dattvā divyāṃ tathā gatim /
analyzed: iti uktvā kuñjaram tasmai dattvā divyām tathā gatim

original: svaṃ vapurdarśayitvā ca hasannindro yayau divam // Bhmj_13.1653 //
analyzed: svam vapuḥ darśayitvā ca hasan indraḥ yayau divam
hastikūṭīyam   /
sa śarīraḥ purā rājā brahma lokam bhagīrathaḥ
yayau mahī go vṛṣa daḥ kanyā grāma pura pradaḥ
sat ācārāḥ satyavantaḥ jyeṣṭha śuśrūṣavaḥ narāḥ
guru pūjā ratāḥ kṣāntāḥ bhavanti iha śata āyuṣaḥ
upavāsa vrata juṣām tithi nakṣatra yogataḥ
niyamāḥ divya phala dāḥ jagāda iti aṅgirāḥ purā
śrutvā iti dharmatanaye dehi deha gatim punar
praṣṭum samudyate sākṣāt bṛhaspatiḥ atha āyayau
sa pūjitaḥ muni varaiḥ bhīṣmeṇa vidureṇa ca
dhṛtārāṣṭreṇa kṛṣṇena bheje ratna ujjvala āsanam
yudhiṣṭhira urcayitvā tam prayātaḥ bhīṣma śāsanāt
papraccha ācāra saṃsāra maraṇam deha dehinoḥ
tatas bravīt suraguruḥ śarīram pāñcabhautikam
pañcadhā yātam utsṛjya svapna vat ceṣṭate naraḥ
deha bhaṅge nirālokam gatvā deśam abāndavam
dehī vāsanayā viddhaḥ tat tat vetti śubha aśubham
tyaktvā kalevaram jantuḥ nirmokam iva pannagaḥ

original: dharmādharmayuto yāti sāmoda iva mārutaḥ // Bhmj_13.1662 //
analyzed: dharma adharma yutaḥ yāti sa āmodaḥ iva mārutaḥ
tat tat bhuktvā nirākāraḥ karma puryaṣṭaka āśaśrayaḥ

original: bhūtaiḥ samāgamaṃ yāti punaḥ śukramukhāccyutaḥ // Bhmj_13.1663 //
analyzed: bhūtaiḥ samāgamam yāti punar śukra mukhāt cyutaḥ
karmabhiḥ śavalaiḥ tatra madhu vat lipyate punar
cakra vat paśu koṭīnām liptaḥ bhrāmyati yoniṣu

original: dattvā ca vipulaṃ dānaṃ modate puṇyavānsukhī /
analyzed: dattvā ca vipulam dānam modate puṇyavān sukhī

original: ahiṃsayā yāti divaṃ tṛṣṇayā kaṣṭamaśnute // Bhmj_13.1665 //
analyzed: ahiṃsayā yāti divam tṛṣṇayā kaṣṭam aśnute
gṛhītvā patitaḥ vipraḥ ciram bhavati gardabhaḥ

original: sūkaraḥ kṛkavākuśca jambukaḥ śva sa jāyate // Bhmj_13.1666 //
analyzed: sūkaraḥ kṛkavākuḥ ca jambukaḥ śva sa jāyate

original: gurornikāraṃ kṛtvā ca bhavati śvā tato vṛkaḥ /
analyzed: guroḥ nikāram kṛtvā ca bhavati śvā tatas vṛkaḥ
tatas ca rāsabhaḥ ghoraḥ naraka āvarta nirgataḥ
pitroḥ kṛta apakāraḥ ca śvā kūrmaḥ śalyakaḥ tathā
vyāḍaḥ dāsaḥ ca bhavati kramāt karma kṣaya avadhi
bhartṛ dveṣī kapiḥ bhūtvā mūṣikaḥ śvā api jāyate

original: nikṣepahartā duḥkhāya bhrāntvā yoniśataṃ śanaiḥ // Bhmj_13.1669 //
analyzed: nikṣepa hartā duḥkhāya bhrāntvā yoni śatam śanais
amedhya āvarta kalile jāyate kutsitaḥ krimī
para nindā rataḥ śārṅgaḥ matsyaḥ viśvasta gātakaḥ
mṛgaḥ chāgaḥ kīṭaḥ ca kramāt bhavati duṣkṛtī
sasya hartā bhavati ākhuḥ kroḍaḥ kauleyakaḥ tathā
kravyāda jātim vividhām bhajate pārajāyikaḥ

original: śūdro vipravadhūṃ gatvā krimirākhuśca jāyate // Bhmj_13.1672 //
analyzed: śūdraḥ vipra vadhūm gatvā krimiḥ ākhuḥ ca jāyate
kṛtaghnaḥ kāla puruṣaiḥ narakeṣu āhataḥ bhṛśam
kṛmiḥ bhūtvā tatas garbha śateṣu antar vipadyate
kṛmiḥ tris sapta kṛtvas ca bhavati bhrūṇa hā naraḥ
makṣikā bhojana haraḥ mūṣikaḥ ca yava anna hṛt

original: cīrī ca lalanasteno dadhihartā tathā bakaḥ /
analyzed: cīrī ca lalana stenaḥ dadhi hartā tathā bakaḥ
piplaḥ taila haraṇāt phala stainyāt pipīlakaḥ
miṣṭānna cauryāt dhūkaḥ ca vastra cauryāt kapotakaḥ
chacchundariḥ gandha harī matsyaḥ bhavati nihnavī
evam bahuvidhaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ citra pākaiḥ ku karmabhiḥ

original: tāṃ tāṃ tamomayīṃ yoniṃ saṃsaranti śarīriṇaḥ // Bhmj_13.1677 //
analyzed: tām tām tamaḥ mayīm yonim saṃsaranti śarīriṇaḥ
evaṃvidhāni pāpāni prāyāścittaiḥ vinā nṛṇām

original: dānena kila śāmyanti dānaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ // Bhmj_13.1678 //
analyzed: dānena kila śāmyanti dānam hi paramā gatiḥ
annam eva param prāṇāḥ bhūtānām amṛta udgatiḥ

original: annadānaṃ mahattasmātpātraṃ yatra na gaṇyate // Bhmj_13.1679 //
analyzed: anna dānam mahat tasmāt pātram yatra na gaṇyate
anna pradaḥ sudhā varṣī jāyate dhanavān sadā
śrīmān punar dadāni annam prāc saṃskāra dhiyā eva saḥ
labhate punar aiśvaryam iti eva cakra līlayā
parivartini kāle smin puṇyavān na apacīyate
iti uktvā bhagavān sākṣāt pūjyamānaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
tejaḥ rañjita diś cakraḥ divam ācakrame guruḥ
ahiṃsā lakṣaṇam dharmam sarva bhūta abhaya pradam
ajātaśatruṇa pṛṣṭaḥ punar śāntanavaḥ bravīt
a māṃsa bhakṣaṇam nṝṇām aśvamedha śataiḥ samam

original: māṃsaṃ hi jāyate ghorānnānyatra vadhapātakāt // Bhmj_13.1684 //
analyzed: māṃsam hi jāyate ghorāt na anyatra vadha pātakāt
māṃsāt eva samutpannam māṃsam māṃsa mayaḥ naraḥ

original: tulyavyathe 'sminsaṃsāre bhuñjānaḥ kiṃ na lajjate // Bhmj_13.1685 //
analyzed: tulya vyathe smin saṃsāre bhuñjānaḥ kim na lajjate
kaṇṭakena api saṃspṛṣṭāḥ yānti kām api vikriyām
te pi śastra nikṛttasya paśoḥ aśnanti vigraham
bhayam ākampanam tīvram dehinām deha saṃkṣaye

original: dṛṣṭvā ko nāma māṃsebhyaḥ spṛhāṃ kuryādarākṣasaḥ // Bhmj_13.1687 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā kaḥ nāma māṃsebhyaḥ spṛhām kuryāt arākṣasaḥ
prayāti nirbhayam dhāma puṇya kāruṇya sāgaraḥ
kratuḥ nirvighna saṃbhāraḥ tīrtham adhva śrama uñjhitam
ahiṃsā nāma paramam vratam atyakta bhojanam
a māṃsa bhakṣaṇam
prāṇāḥ priyatarāḥ puṃsām yaiḥ hutāḥ te raṇa anale
tad gatim kathaya iti uktaḥ rājñā bhīṣmaḥ vadat punar
evam etad priyāḥ prāṇāḥ duḥkhinām api dehinām

original: śaknoti kastānsahasā tyuktaṃ sattvavato vinā // Bhmj_13.1691 //
analyzed: śaknoti kaḥ tān sahasā tyuktam sattvavataḥ vinā
sarvathā jīvita ābhraṃśe bhīravaḥ bhaya viklavāḥ
tṛṇa āñcite nayane mīlayanti eva kātarāḥ
purā śakaṭa saṃtrāsāt vidrutam pathi kīṭakam

original: vyāso vilokya papraccha sasmitaṃ jñānalocanaḥ // Bhmj_13.1693 //
analyzed: vyāsaḥ vilokya papraccha sa smitam jñāna locanaḥ
asmin api śarīre te rakṣā artham kaḥ yama āgrahaḥ

original: tatsarvaṃ maraṇaṃ manye tava kutsitajīvinaḥ // Bhmj_13.1694 //
analyzed: tat sarvam maraṇam manye tava kutsita jīvinaḥ
etat śrutvā muni vacaḥ tam kīṭaḥ pratyabhāṣata

original: nāsti kāyasamaṃ kiṃciddehināṃ vallabhaṃ vibho // Bhmj_13.1695 //
analyzed: nā asti kāya samam kiṃcid dehinām vallabham vibho
kīṭikā prema baddhasya sūkṣma kīṭaka putriṇaḥ

original: vivarāntaragehe me śakrasyeva sukhaṃ divi // Bhmj_13.1696 //
analyzed: vivara antara gehe me śakrasya iva sukham divi
snehasya āyatanam prāṇāḥ kaḥ svayam tyaktum īśvaraḥ
muhūrtam api labhyante na ete meru śataiḥ api
śūdraḥ ham bahubhiḥ pāpaiḥ kīṭa yonim imām śritaḥ

original: pitroḥ śuśrūṣayā kiṃtu mune jātiṃ smarāmyaham // Bhmj_13.1698 //
analyzed: pitroḥ śuśrūṣayā kiṃtu mune jātim smarāmi aham
tat śrutvā karuṇā ambhodhiḥ bhagavān bhūta bhāvanaḥ

original: tasmai nṛpapadaṃ vyāso dadau janmāntare kramāt // Bhmj_13.1699 //
analyzed: tasmai nṛpa padam vyāsaḥ dadau janmāntare kramāt

original: vipro 'tha tadgirā bhūtvā sa yayau paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: vipraḥ tha tad girā bhūtvā sa yayau paramām gatim
āpatsu mahatām eva darśanam kalpapādapaḥ
tasmāt ati priyāḥ prāṇāḥ yaiḥ tyaktāḥ saṃmukhaiḥ yudhi
dhairya abdhayaḥ te tridive spardhante vibudha adhipam
kīṭaka upākhyānam
vidyāyāḥ tapasaḥ vā api dānāt vā kim viśiṣyate

original: iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitibhujā babhāṣe jāhanavīsutaḥ // Bhmj_13.1702 //
analyzed: iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitibhujā babhāṣe jāhanavīsutaḥ
vārāṇasyām purā vyāsaḥ maitreyeṇa nimantritaḥ

original: bhuktvā prahṛṣṭaḥ provāca kathānte tapasāṃ nidhiḥ // Bhmj_13.1703 //
analyzed: bhuktvā prahṛṣṭaḥ provāca kathā ante tapasām nidhiḥ

original: tejaḥ paraṃ tapo nāma divyameva balaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: tejaḥ param tapaḥ nāma divyam eva balam tapaḥ

original: paśyanti santastapasā jñānaṃ hi tapasaḥ phalam // Bhmj_13.1704 //
analyzed: paśyanti santaḥ tapasā jñānam hi tapasaḥ phalam
asmin bhava mahā moha taptaḥ vyāpte jagattraye
vidyā eva paramam cakṣuḥ akṣuṇṇā loka kāraṇam
kiṃtu sarvam atītya etat dānam eva viśiṣyate

original: dānātparaṃ na saṃsāre dehināṃ śarma vidyate // Bhmj_13.1706 //
analyzed: dānāt param na saṃsāre dehinām śarma vidyate
anna dānaiḥ sukṛtinaḥ prayātāḥ paramam padam
muni prāpyam anāyāsa līlayā sattva śālinaḥ
annam haviḥ sudhā pāṇāḥ tad dātā jīvita pradaḥ
iti uktvā munim āmantrya jagāma muni puṃgavaḥ
maitreya bhikṣā
pṛṣṭaḥ tha yoṣitām rājñā sat ācāraḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: uvāca satataṃ strīṇāṃ sadācāraḥ satīvratam // Bhmj_13.1709 //
analyzed: uvāca satatam strīṇām sat ācāraḥ satī vratam
kaikeyī sumanāḥ nāma sura loka sthitām purā
papraccha śāṇḍilīm dīpta tejaḥ puñja jita amarām

original: subhage kena tapasā dānena caritena vā /
analyzed: subhage kena tapasā dānena caritena vā
bhāsi divya vimāne smin mamūrtā iva aṃśumataḥ prabhā
kutūhalena iti tayā pṛṣṭā provāca śāṇḍilī

original: nāhaṃ vratairna saṃnyāsairna dānena divaṃ śritā // Bhmj_13.1712 //
analyzed: na aham vrataiḥ na saṃnyāsaiḥ na dānena divam śritā
pūjitaḥ satatam bhaktyā mayā daivata vat patiḥ

original: na hi santaḥ praśaṃsanti tapaḥ strīṇāmataḥ param // Bhmj_13.1713 //
analyzed: na hi santaḥ praśaṃsanti tapaḥ strīṇām atas param
niṣkuṭe dvāri harmye vā rājamārga avalokinī

original: nābhavaṃ proṣite vāpi patyau vratavivarjitā // Bhmj_13.1714 //
analyzed: na abhavam proṣite vā api patyau vrata vivarjitā
chāyā iva anapagā anugatā
bhartuḥ kope bhītā hita eṣiṇī

original: bhūtvāhaṃ tridivaṃ prāptā manovākkarmabhiḥ satī // Bhmj_13.1715 //
analyzed: bhūtvā aham tridivam prāptā manaḥ vāc karmabhiḥ satī
iti uktvā śāṇḍilī prāyāt tatas niṣadham unnatam
tasmāt satī vratāt anyat nārīṇām na parāyaṇam
śāṇḍilīsumanā saṃvādaḥ

original: adhikaṃ prīyate kiṃsvitsāmnā dānena vā janaḥ /
analyzed: adhikam prīyate kim svid sāmnā dānena vā janaḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ yudhiṣṭhireṇa iti punar devavrataḥ bravīt

original: purā vane dvijaḥ kaścidgṛhīto rakṣasā balāt /
analyzed: purā vane dvijaḥ kaścid gṛhītaḥ rakṣasā balāt
sarva upāya vihīna tvāt sāmnā muktim acintayat
niśācaraḥ tamavat vañcanāya vadha udyataḥ
pāṇḍuraḥ durbalaḥ ca aham kena ait kathyatām iti
vipraḥ tam ūce nūnam te dūrībhūtaḥ suhṛd janaḥ

original: niḥsahāyena cāptā śrīstvayā tenāsi pāṇḍuraḥ // Bhmj_13.1720 //
analyzed: niḥsahāyena ca āptā śrīḥ tvayā tena asi pāṇḍuraḥ
ārādhyamānaḥ yatnena te vyaktam animittataḥ

original: viraktaḥ svajano yāsi tena vā pariśuṣyasi // Bhmj_13.1721 //
analyzed: viraktaḥ sva janaḥ yāsi tena vā pariśuṣyasi
tvattaḥ hīna guṇān anyān vyakte paśyasi pūjitān
aiśvarya māna subhagān tena vā durbalaḥ bhavān

original: vyaktaṃ tyāgī daridro 'si guṇairnūnaṃ na pūjyase /
analyzed: vyaktam tyāgī daridraḥ si guṇaiḥ nūnam na pūjyase

original: prājñasya te na śṛṇvanti sādhurvā vañcyase khalaiḥ // Bhmj_13.1723 //
analyzed: prājñasya te na śṛṇvanti sādhuḥ vā vañcyase khalaiḥ

original: mūrkho vā śāstrarasiko mānī hīnakulo 'si vā /
analyzed: mūrkhaḥ vā śāstra rasikaḥ mānī vā

original: duḥkhaṃ svapiṣi manye 'haṃ cintayā hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ // Bhmj_13.1724 //
analyzed: duḥkham svapiṣi manye ham cintayā hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
śrutvā etat āśaya grāhī brāhmaṇa uktam niśācaraḥ

original: prītastatyāja taṃ sāmnā ko hi sāntvairna tuṣyati // Bhmj_13.1725 //
analyzed: prītaḥ tatyāja tam sāmnā kaḥ hi sāntvaiḥ na tuṣyati
harimakṛśīyam
kṛṣṇa prabhāvam rājñā śāntanavaḥ bravīt

original: purā tapaḥsthitaṃ śauriṃ munayo draṣṭumāyayuḥ // Bhmj_13.1726 //
analyzed: purā tapaḥ sthitam śaurim munayaḥ draṣṭum āyayuḥ
dadṛśuḥ te tatas tatra viṣṇu vaktra utthita agninā
dagdham vanam mahat paścāt tena eva āpyāyitam dṛśā
tat dṛṣṭvā nārada mukhāt divyam bubudhire param
tad girā vaiṣṇavam dhāma vipluṣṭa acala śekharam
tatas nānā kathā ākhyāna kovidaḥ kaiṭabha tviṣā
kathā ante nāradaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ prastāva ucitam abhyadhāt

original: purā himagirau gaurī dhūrjaṭeḥ kila līlayā /
analyzed: purā himagirau gaurī dhūrjaṭeḥ kila līlayā

original: netre karābhyāṃ pidadhe sa tenābhūttrilocanaḥ // Bhmj_13.1730 //
analyzed: netre karābhyām pidadhe sa tena abhūt trilocanaḥ
tṛtīya nayana udbhūta vahninā saḥ bhavat giriḥ
pluṣyat sāla latā jāla jvālā valayita ambaraḥ
tatas gaurī girā cakre punar gaurīgurum girim
smera puṣpa latā vṛkṣam dṛśā śītāṃśu śekharaḥ
tatra pṛṣṭaḥ bahuvidhāḥ kathāḥ praṇaya lālasaḥ
devyā kathā ante bhagavān ūce dharma artha nirṇayam
pravṛttānām sat ācāram varṇa āśrama vibhāga jam
nivṛttānām ca niḥsaṅga kriyā nirvāṇa jam phalam
tatas śaśāṅka cūḍena pṛṣṭā devī mṛgī dṛśām
śaśaṃsa puṇyam caritam vara ārādhana daivatam
athā bravīt nīlakaṇṭhaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sarvaiḥ muni īśvaraiḥ

original: kāraṇaṃ paramaṃ viṣṇuṃ bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyaye // Bhmj_13.1736 //
analyzed: kāraṇam paramam viṣṇum bhūtānām prabhava apyaye
vasudevasya tanayaḥ bhaviṣyati hariḥ kṣitau

original: sa sūryaḥ sa ca śītāṃśu so 'haṃ sa ca caturmukhaḥ /
analyzed: sa sūryaḥ sa ca śītāṃśu saḥ haṃ sa ca caturmukhaḥ
sarva deva mayaḥ śauriḥ kaṃsa keśi niṣūdanaḥ
umāpateḥ api puras śrutam asmābhiḥ īśvarāt
etat śrutvā muni vacaḥ dvārakām etya keśavaḥ
avāpa putram rukmiṇyām sva icchā sṛṣṭa jagattrayaḥ
dhanyaḥ si yasya te rājan kamalā vallabhaḥ vibhuḥ
viśva rakṣāmaṇiḥ saḥ yam goptā garuḍa lāñchanaḥ
kathayitvā iti gāṅgeye muhūrtam maunam āsthite
ūce muni sabhā madhye śanakais dharmanandanaḥ
daivatam paramam śarma kim ekam sarva dehinām

original: kasminpratiṣṭhitaṃ viśvaṃ stutyā muktipradaśca kaḥ // Bhmj_13.1742 //
analyzed: kasmin pratiṣṭhitam viśvam stutyā mukti pradaḥ ca kaḥ
iti ukte dharmaputreṇa babhāṣe jāhnavīsutaḥ
manasā puṇḍarīkākṣam natvā viṣṇum anāmayam
anantaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ devadevaḥ jagatprabhuḥ
stutaḥ nāma sahasreṇa mokṣa daḥ garuḍadhvajaḥ
jagat pratiṣṭhitam tasmin daivatam paramam ca saḥ

original: nāmnāṃ sahasraṃ munayo yasya gāyanti muktaye // Bhmj_13.1745 //
analyzed: nāmnām sahasram munayaḥ yasya gāyanti muktaye
viśvam viṣṇuḥ vaṣaṭkāraḥ bhūta bhavya bhava ātmanaḥ
prabhoḥ bhūta bhṛtaḥ bhūta bhāvanasya bhava chidaḥ
patyuḥ puṃsaḥ purāṇasya kṣetra tretrajña sākṣiṇaḥ
bhuvaḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ śaṃbhoḥ vidhātuḥ vedhasaḥ vidheḥ
hareḥ hiraṇyagarbhasya śrīpatoḥ viśvakarmaṇaḥ
vṛṣākapeḥ amoghasya sahasrākṣasya gopateḥ
sahasra śirasaḥ viṣṇoḥ vyāpinaḥ praṇava ātmanaḥ
stotram nāma sahasra aṅkam mantrarājam pracakṣate
iti uktvā vaidikaiḥ divyaiḥ gauṇa mukhyaiḥ ca nāmabhiḥ
sahasra saṃkhyaiḥ tuṣṭāva deva bhīṣmaḥ sanātanam
śrutvā etat prayataḥ kṛṣṇam vanditvā dharmanandanaḥ
prabhāvam bhūmidevānām papraccha dyunadī sutam
saḥ vadat brahma niṣṭhānām brāhmaṇānām bhayāt kila

original: udeti somaḥ sūryaśca prayāti ca samīraṇaḥ // Bhmj_13.1752 //
analyzed: udeti somaḥ sūryaḥ ca prayāti ca samīraṇaḥ
dattātreya vara avāpta sahasra bhujam unmadam
kārtavīryam purā prāha vāyuḥ jita gattrayam
brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraḥ na asti rāja indra balavattaraḥ

original: bhavādṛśā dṛśā yeṣāṃ bhavanti na bhavanti ca // Bhmj_13.1754 //
analyzed: bhavādṛśāḥ dṛśā yeṣām bhavanti na bhavanti ca
soma putryā vṛtaḥ pūrvam uttasthe yādasām prabhum
tad kāmam apibat kopāt dayitām ājahāra ca
nirjita akhila gīrvāṇa gandharvāḥ dānavāḥ purā

original: sṛṣṭo 'triṇā śītakaraḥ śakraṃ ca cyavano 'jayat // Bhmj_13.1756 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭaḥ u triṇā śītakaraḥ śakram ca cyavanaḥ jayat
surāṇām daitya samare rakṣitā timire purā

original: sṛṣṭo 'triṇā śītakaraḥ śakraṃ ca cyavano 'jayat // Bhmj_13.1757 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭaḥ u triṇā śītakaraḥ śakram ca cyavanaḥ jayat
iti brāhmaṇa māhātmyam śrutvā haihaya bhūpatiḥ
arjunaḥ pujayan nityam bhūmidevān ān anya dhīḥ
pavana arjuna saṃvādaḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ prabhāvaṃ keśavo vibhuḥ /
analyzed: atas param brāhmaṇānām prabhāvam keśavaḥ vibhuḥ
jānāti nābhi nalina sva icchā sṛṣṭa caturmukhaḥ
iti bhīṣmeṇa kathite hṛṣīkeśam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: papraccha vipramāhātmyaṃ sa ca pṛṣṭastamabhyadhāt // Bhmj_13.1760 //
analyzed: papraccha vipra māhātmyam sa ca pṛṣṭaḥ tam abhyadhāt
purā aham raukmiṇeyena pṛṣṭaḥ śaktim dvijanmanām

original: avadaṃ tapasā yeṣāṃ kampante daivatānyapi // Bhmj_13.1761 //
analyzed: avadam tapasā yeṣām kampante daivatāni api
putra sarva prayatnena pūjaya brāhmaṇān sadā

original: ete krodhaprasādābhyāṃ jīvayanti dahanti ca // Bhmj_13.1762 //
analyzed: ete krodha prasādābhyām jīvayanti dahanti ca
pratiśrāya arthī durvāsāḥ purā dīpta akṣi mūrdhajaḥ

original: uvāsa madgṛhe taistaiḥ sevyamānaḥ priyairmayā // Bhmj_13.1763 //
analyzed: uvāsa mad gṛhe taiḥ taiḥ sevyamānaḥ priyaiḥ mayā

original: sa bhuktvā pāyasaṃ taptamucchiṣṭena ruṣā jvalan /
analyzed: sa bhuktvā pāyasam taptam ucchiṣṭena ruṣā jvalan
limpa aṅgāni iti mām āha tat ca asmi akaravam bhayāt

original: rukmiṇīṃ sa rathe kṛtvā babhrāma bahuyojanam /
analyzed: rukmiṇīm sa rathe kṛtvā babhrāma bahu yojanam

original: nirvikāraṃ ca māṃ dṛṣṭāva tutoṣa paruṣāśrayaḥ // Bhmj_13.1765 //
analyzed: nirvikāram ca mām dṛṣṭāva tutoṣa paruṣa āśrayaḥ
sa mām ūce tava ucchiṣṭa liptam vajra mayam vapuḥ

original: bhaviṣyati vinā pādau tau niliptau yatastvayā // Bhmj_13.1766 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati vinā pādau tau niliptau yatas tvayā
durvāsasaḥ bhikṣā
etat kṛṣṇa vacaḥ śrutvā pārthaḥ śāntanavāt punar
śuśrāva deva rāja ṛṣi vaṃśān kalmaṣa nāśanān
kaṇvaiḥ abhyavakrīta vasiṣṭha bhṛgu kaśyapān
duḥṣyanta rāma nahuṣa alarka śveta bhagīrathān
kathayitvā kṣaṇam sthitvā tūṣṇīm niḥśabdasa

original: puraṃ vyāsājñayā pārthaṃ visasarja suravrataḥ // Bhmj_13.1769 //
analyzed: puram vyāsa ājñayā pārtham visasarja suravrataḥ
kṛṣṇena saha kaunteyaḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ ca saha anugaiḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭram puraskṛtya prayayau hastināpuram
pūjyamānaḥ suraiḥ dātā sthitvā tatra yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
dṛṣṭvā uttaram sa saṃprāptam punar āyāt pitāmaham
sa anugaḥ sa samabhyetya gāṅgeyam śara śāyinam
praṇamya smi iti nigadya samupāviśat
muni indra juṣṭe sadasi brahma loke iva apare
jāte niḥśabda saṃcāre bhīṣma vaktra avalokini
śanais unmīlya nayane pāṇḍavān vīkṣya sa anugān
vāc gamī gambhīram avadat gāṅgeyaḥ pāṇḍava agrajam
kāle diṣṭyā bhavān prāptaḥ parivṛtte divākaraḥ
māsa dvayam atītam me niśāta śara śāyinaḥ
tvām āmantrya vrajāmi eṣa putra lokān sanātanān
iti uktvā satya dugdha abdhiḥ kiṃcid āvṛtta kaṃdharaḥ
uvāca vidurasya agre dhṛtarāṣṭram pitāmahaḥ
rājan vidyā mayam cakṣuḥ akṣuṇṇām tava lakṣyate

original: mā gamaḥ putraśokārtyā mohaṃ kālo hi durjayaḥ // Bhmj_13.1777 //
analyzed: mā gamaḥ putra śoka ārtyā moham kālaḥ hi durjayaḥ
putra vat paśya bhūpālam anṛśaṃsam yudhiṣṭhiram

original: prayātu śeṣaḥ kāle 'yaṃ tava saṃtoṣaśālinaḥ // Bhmj_13.1778 //
analyzed: prayātu śeṣaḥ kāle yam tava saṃtoṣa śālinaḥ

original: etaduktvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ stutvā mūrdhnā praṇamya ca /
analyzed: etat uktvā hṛṣīkeśam stutvā mūrdhnā praṇamya ca
babhāṣe bhagavan gantum anujānīhi mām iti
atha kṛṣṇa abhyanujñātaḥ nistaraṅgaḥ iva udadhiḥ
muhūrtam abhavat bhīṣmaḥ dadhānaḥ prāṇa dhāraṇām
antar sparśa rasāt tasya gātrāṇi tyajataḥ bahis
viśalyāni śanais sarve dadṛśuḥ vismaya ākulāḥ
sa galita sakala antar svānta viśrānti mūla udgata nija bala śakti sphoṭita aśeṣa cakram
vitata tarala tāra sphāra tejaḥ prakāra prasṛta marut udañcat madhya nāḍi krameṇa
lalita dala saroja proccaṭat jīva haṃsaḥ dṛśam ati śaśi sūryām bhrū vibhāge niveśya
galita karaṇa vṛtti grāma niḥsyanāda lakṣyaḥ sapadi kim api bhīṣmaḥ cintayan saṃbabhūva
bhīṣma utkrāntiḥ
atha jyotiḥ taḍit puñjara aṃśu śata ācitam

original: bhittvā bhīṣmasya mūrdhānaṃ viveśa vimalaṃ nabhaḥ // Bhmj_13.1784 //
analyzed: bhittvā bhīṣmasya mūrdhānam viveśa vimalam nabhaḥ
ratna ābharaṇaiḥ vāsobhiḥ kusumaiḥ tathā
dharmarājaḥ sa viduraḥ cakre vaimānikam svayam
chettram tasya yaśaḥ śubhram yuyutsuḥ tūrṇam agrahīt
cāmare sattva dhavale bhīmasena arjunau api
sa bāṣpam bharata strībhiḥ tālavṛnta anilena saḥ
vījyamānaḥ citām prāpa śrīkhaṇḍa aguru kalpitām
sa jīve iva saṃlīne gāṅgeye sphāra tejasi
yudhiṣṭhira mukhāḥ cakruḥ sa aśru netrāḥ jalakriyām
tatra mandākinī tīre viṣaṇṇaḥ rājñi sa anuge
jala madhyāt samuttasthau jāhnavī sa aśru locanā
sā vihvalā śokavatī viṣaṇṇaiḥ parama ṛṣibhiḥ
vyāsa nārada kaṇva ādyaiḥ muhur ālokitā avadat
hā putra tripura arāti śiṣyasya kṣatriya dviṣaḥ

original: jetā tasyāpi rāmasya nihato 'si kathaṃ paraiḥ // Bhmj_13.1791 //
analyzed: jetā tasya api rāmasya nihataḥ si katham paraiḥ

original: aho nu tvayi kālena yāte 'staṃ yaśasāṃ nidhau /
analyzed: aho nu tvayi kālena yāte stam yaśasām nidhau

original: śocyeyaṃ pṛthivī śūnyā vīraratnavinā kṛtā // Bhmj_13.1792 //
analyzed: śocyā iyam pṛthivī śūnyā vīra ratna vinā kṛtā

original: kā nāma jananī pāpā madvidhānyā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: kā nāma jananī pāpā madvidhā anyā bhaviṣyati

original: nihataṃ tvādṛśaṃ putraṃ yā śrutvāpi na dīryate // Bhmj_13.1793 //
analyzed: nihatam tvādṛśam putram yā śrutvā api na dīryate

original: aho bata varākeṇa hato bhīṣmaḥ śikhaṇḍinā /
analyzed: aho bata varākeṇa hataḥ bhīṣmaḥ śikhaṇḍinā
kupitaḥ kuñjarārātiḥ jambukena nipātitaḥ
iti pralāpa mukharām jahnukanyām janārdanaḥ
śanais āśvāsayan ūce megha gambhīra niḥsvanaḥ
vijñāta parama arthā api vasu śāpe sākṣiṇī

original: sāmānyajananīva tvaṃ kathaṃ devi vimuhyase // Bhmj_13.1796 //
analyzed: sāmānya jananī iva tvam katham devi vimuhyase
na hi śāntanavam bhīṣmam tripurāri parākramam
hantum śikhaṇḍinaḥ śaktiḥ vinā kālāt balīyasaḥ

original: sa yātaḥ paramaṃ dhāma svacchandanidhanaḥ svayam /
analyzed: sa yātaḥ paramam dhāma svacchanda nidhanaḥ svayam

original: aśocyaṃ mā śucaḥ putraṃ ko 'nyo jāyeta tadvidhaḥ // Bhmj_13.1798 //
analyzed: a śocyam mā śucaḥ putram kaḥ nyaḥ jāyeta tadvidhaḥ
iti vyāsa ādibhiḥ sārdham kṛṣṇena āśvāsitā śanais
niḥsyanda mīna makarā kṣaṇam mandākinī babhau
tatas yudhiṣṭhira mukhāḥ tām samāmantrya sa anugāḥ
duḥkha ākulāḥ nyavartanta yāte stam vāsareśvare
iti śāntiparvaṇi dāna dharmāḥ samāptāḥ
samāptam śāntiparva
